**Summary** **Position Summary** **Application Development - Analyst - Deloitte Support Services India Private Limited** **Key Responsibilities:**

* ServiceNow Ticketing System Management
* Manage and resolve tickets related to communication systems using ServiceNow.
* Develop and maintain documentation for ticketing processes and resolutions.
* Documentation Management
* Create, update, and maintain comprehensive documentation for processes, systems, and procedures.
* Ensure all documentation is accurate, accessible, and up to date.
* Collaborate with various departments to gather information and improve documentation practices.
* Microsoft Teams Operations
* Provide technical support and training to users to enhance their experience with Teams.
* Conduct user training sessions and create documentation.

 **Required Skills & Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Communications, or a related field.
* Minimum of 1-3 years of experience in enterprise communications or a similar role.
* Proficiency in ServiceNow and Microsoft Teams
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work effectively in a global, multicultural environment.
* Preferred Skills
* Experience with other communication platforms and tools.
* Certifications in Microsoft Teams are a plus.

 **The team**At Deloitte, we’re all about collaboration. And nowhere is this more apparent than among our 2,000-strong internal services team. With our combined specialist skills, we provide all the essential support and advice our client-facing colleagues need, right across the firm. This enables them to focus all of their efforts on delivering the best service possible to their clients. Covering seven distinct areas; Human Resources, Clients & Industries, Finance & Legal, Practice Support Services, Quality & Risk Services, IT Services, and Workplace Services & Real Estate, together we live, breathe and deliver the Deloitte experience .  
  
 **Location**  : Hyderabad  
  
 **Work shift Timings**  : 11 AM to 8 PM  
  
**Qualifications**

* Bachelor of Engineering/ Bachelor of Technology
* 1-3 years’ experience in a similar role and Enterprise organisation.

**Our purpose**Deloitte’s purpose is to make an impact that matters for our people, clients, and communities. At Deloitte, purpose is synonymous with how we work every day. It defines who we are. Our purpose comes through in our work with clients that enables impact and value in their organizations, as well as through our own investments, commitments, and actions across areas that help drive positive outcomes for our communities.  
  
**Our people and culture**Our inclusive culture empowers our people to be who they are, contribute their unique perspectives, and make a difference individually and collectively. It enables us to leverage different ideas and perspectives, and bring more creativity and innovation to help solve our clients' most complex challenges. This makes Deloitte one of the most rewarding places to work.  
  
**Professional development**At Deloitte, professionals have the opportunity to work with some of the best and discover what works best for them. Here, we prioritize professional growth, offering diverse learning and networking opportunities to help accelerate careers and enhance leadership skills. Our state-of-the-art DU: The Leadership Center in India, located in Hyderabad, represents a tangible symbol of our commitment to the holistic growth and development of our people. Explore DU: The Leadership Center in India .  
  
**Benefits To Help You Thrive**At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. Our comprehensive rewards program helps us deliver a distinctly Deloitte experience that helps that empowers our professionals to thrive mentally, physically, and financially—and live their purpose. To support our professionals and their loved ones, we offer a broad range of benefits. Eligibility requirements may be based on role, tenure, type of employment and/ or other criteria. Learn more about what working at Deloitte can mean for you.  
  
**Recruiting tips**From developing a stand out resume to putting your best foot forward in the interview, we want you to feel prepared and confident as you explore opportunities at Deloitte. Check out recruiting tips from Deloitte recruiters.

Senior Application Support Engineer
===================================



#### [Syngene International Limited](https://in.linkedin.com/company/syngene-international-limited?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Bengaluru, Karnataka, India 1 week ago 146 applicants [See who Syngene International Limited has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D219718%26title%3DSenior%2BApplication%2BSupport%2BEngineer&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

[Apply](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?source=jobs_registration&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fsenior-application-support-engineer-at-syngene-international-limited-4326086184)
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fsenior-application-support-engineer-at-syngene-international-limited-4326086184&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fsenior-application-support-engineer-at-syngene-international-limited-4326086184&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

Date: 2 Dec 2025  
  
Location:  
  
Bangalore, KA, IN, 560099  
  
Division: Dedicated Centre  
  
**Job Title:** Senior Application Support Engineer  
  
**Job Location:** Bengaluru  
  
**About Syngene:** Syngene (www.syngeneintl.com) is an innovation-led contract research, development and manufacturing organization offering integrated scientific services from early discovery to commercial supply.  
  
At Syngene, safety is at the heart of everything we do personally and professionally. Syngene has placed safety at par with business performance with shared responsibility and accountability, including following safety guidelines, procedures and SOPs, in letter and spirit  
  
**Mandatory expectation for all roles as per Syngene safety guidelines**

* Overall adherence to safe practices and procedures of oneself and the teams aligned
* Contributing to development of procedures, practices and systems that ensures safe operations and compliance to company’s integrity & quality standards
* Driving a corporate culture that promotes environment, health, and safety (EHS) mindset and operational discipline at the workplace at all times.
* Ensuring safety of self, teams and lab/plant by adhering to safety protocols and following environment, health, and safety (EHS) requirements at all times in the workplace.
* Ensure all assigned mandatory trainings related to data integrity, health, and safety measures are completed on time by all members of the team including self
* Compliance to Syngene’ s quality standards at all times

**Core Purpose Of The Role**We are currently hiring for our dedicated center BMS with whom we have had a long-standing association for 15 years and are growing stronger. We have multiple positions open as we are setting up our Global Application Support team in India for Emerson Syncade and DeltaV which are key platforms in supporting the Manufacturing Execution System for various BMS manufacturing sites worldwide.  
  
Reporting to the Application Support Lead Engineer, the successful candidate will be responsible for providing technical support to end users, with focus on supporting two main applications: Emerson Syncade and DeltaV. These two platforms are pivotal in supporting the Manufacturing Execution System for various BMS manufacturing sites globally. The Application Support Engineer will identify and resolve technical issues including developing and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders.  
  
As an Sr Application Support Engineer, you will be providing front line support to the Cell Therapy division for 4 offshore locations: Bothell, WA + Leiden, NL + Devens, MA + Summit, NJ.  
  
**Note:** This is a remote position that involves 24/7 technical support, and we are seeking candidates who are comfortable working in rotational shifts.  
  
**Key Responsibilities Include**

* Collaborate with business stakeholders and implementation partners to configure, build, and perform implementations, enhancements and bug fixes using Syncade MES.
* Work with business process leads to design master data, recipes, and define best practices.
* Provide support for operationalizing the manufacturing and peripheral systems.
* Ensure uninterrupted 24/7 operation of manufacturing systems for CAR T manufacturing, including on-call support on weekends on a rotation basis.
* Support daily operation and future enhancements of Syncade MES and other Manufacturing systems as an IT system owner and technical expert.
* Support integration initiatives between site manufacturing systems and above-site, enterprise systems, e.g., LIMS, ERP, RTMS, etc.
* Triage and provide technical support to our users’ requests, with focus on supporting Emerson Syncade and DeltaV.
* Work closely with our users to identify and resolve technical issues, ensuring that they are resolved in a timely and efficient manner.
* Work independently and with internal teams to identify and resolve complex technical issues.
* Document and record issues and escalations in ServiceNow to help build and maintain a knowledge base related to technical aspects of the platforms.
* Follow escalation processes and interface with different tier teams as needed.
* Write Ad hoc SQL Queries to pull MES Data for non-urgent requests.

**Basic Qualifications**

* Expert in pharma/biotech projects, focusing on Manufacturing and IT disciplines.
* Knowledge of shop floor activities, Good Manufacturing Practices (GMPs), and process automation.
* Prior experience in Manufacturing Execution System (MES) and support, preferably Syncade MES.
* Bachelor’s degree in Chemical, Mechanical, Biomedical, Electrical or Computer Engineering, or MIS discipline.
* Experience with reporting systems like Informetric InfoBatch.
* Experience with labeling systems like Bartender.
* Experience integrating MES with other enterprise applications like ERP(Oracle/SAP), LIMS, RTMS, etc.
* Ability to author, review, and approve technical documentation, protocols, and reports, including IQ/IQ/PQ protocols, change controls, and SOPs.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Understanding of Electronic Batch Records (EBR) and Review by Exception (RBE). Recipe Authoring is a plus.
* Experience with Microsoft SQL Server, reporting services, database design, and data architecture. Query creation in multiple database environments.
* Experience with Test Strategy, Test Management, and Defect Tracking Tools like HP ALM.
* BA/BS degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Chemical Engineer or a related field. Associates or Technical degree will be considered.

**Key Skills Desired**

* Ability to navigate ambiguity and solve problems in a fast-paced environment.
* Strong technology acumen and understanding of the intersection of business & IT related challenges.
* Ability to make complexities more easily understood through speech and written narrative, and possess excellent professional written and verbal communication as well as interpersonal skills.
* Strong developer of effective partnerships and relationships with all levels and geographies.
* Commitment and passion for achieving desired outcomes such as customer satisfaction (i.e., value, quality, speed).
* Be well organized, able to manage multiple tasks, and prioritize effectively.
* Possess patience and maturity and remain calm under pressure.
* Display a sense of urgency in completion of key responsibilities.
* Possess attention to detail.

IT Support Specialist
=====================



#### [Mintz Group](https://www.linkedin.com/company/mintzgroup?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Mumbai Metropolitan Region 2 weeks ago Over 200 applicants [See who Mintz Group has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D55491%26title%3DInformation%2BTechnology%2BSupport%2BSpecialist&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

[Apply](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?source=jobs_registration&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-specialist-at-mintz-group-4340601088)
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-specialist-at-mintz-group-4340601088&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-specialist-at-mintz-group-4340601088&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**About Mintz Group**At Mintz Group, we specialize in uncovering facts that help clients make informed decisions, mitigate risk, and move forward with confidence. For more than 30 years, our teams have supported clients around the world through diligence, disputes, asset tracing, and complex investigations. We operate across 12 offices with more than 250 professionals, delivering reliable and actionable insights for high stakes matters.  
  
 **Why Join Us**

* Global impact on work that matters for clients across industries
* Expert colleagues who value accuracy, ethics, and collaboration
* Growth through continuous learning and modern workplace tools
* A culture that focuses on quality, accountability, and results

 **What’s This Role About?**Mintz Group is seeking a service minded End User Experience Helpdesk Specialist for our Mumbai office. You will support colleagues worldwide by ensuring a reliable, secure, and efficient computing environment. You will troubleshoot and resolve issues, manage endpoints, and improve processes, all while communicating clearly and prioritizing the user experience.  
  
**Key Responsibilities** **End user support and service delivery**

* Provide responsive first and second level support for global users in a follow the sun model
* Troubleshoot and resolve issues across Windows, Microsoft 365, and Azure connected environments
* Support onboarding and offboarding including account setup, device preparation, and equipment lifecycle management for the Mumbai office
* Communicate clearly with users, set expectations, and close requests with accuracy and care

 **Systems, tools, and workflow management**

* Monitor helpdesk trends and metrics and recommend improvements to elevate user satisfaction
* Manage endpoints with Intune, Autopilot, and Defender to ensure stability, compliance, and security
* Promote adoption of Microsoft 365, Teams, SharePoint, OneDrive, Power Automate, and Copilot
* Maintain clear documentation and refine procedures for consistency and efficiency

 **Operational support and incident resolution**

* Coordinate with Facilities to keep onsite technology operating smoothly including workstations, audiovisual systems, conferencing tools, and network connectivity
* Work with ISPs, hardware suppliers, and facilities vendors to resolve onsite issues promptly
* Apply analytical and debugging skills to identify root causes and prevent recurrence

 **Collaboration and communication**

* Partner with peers and leaders in IT and security to meet business needs and resolve incidents
* Provide timely updates on status, next steps, and resolution timelines
* Demonstrate a calm and professional approach in a fast paced setting

 **Compliance, security, and governance**

* Adhere to cybersecurity and compliance standards including SOC 2, ISO 27001, and India’s Digital Personal Data Protection Act
* Support secure configurations and device compliance in alignment with firm policies

**Essential Skills** **What Makes You a Great Fit**

* 5 to 7 years of hands on IT support experience in a global organization
* Strong knowledge of Windows 10 and 11, Microsoft 365, and Azure Active Directory administration
* Experience with endpoint and security management such as Intune and Defender for Endpoint or equivalent
* Proven diagnostic and problem-solving skills with strong attention to detail
* Excellent written and spoken English to collaborate with international colleagues and vendors
* Familiarity with helpdesk and ITSM tools such as Zendesk or ServiceNow
* Knowledge of SOC 2, ISO 27001, and cybersecurity best practices
* Ability to manage multiple priorities while maintaining service excellence
* Flexibility to provide occasional support outside standard business hours to accommodate global time zones

**Preferred Qualifications**

* Microsoft certifications such as MS 900, MD 102, or AZ 900
* Experience with Power Automate or similar workflow automation tools
* Experience using metrics for process improvement or service quality analysis
* Background in ITIL or ISO 20000 service management environments
* Prior experience supporting IT in a multinational corporate environment.

Show more


Show less

**Introduction**The Technical Support Specialist/Advisor is primarily responsible for performing a full workload of technical services for IBM employees with complete responsibility for customer satisfaction with the services provided. Services include some or all the following: software configuration, device setup, upgrades, device reimaging, device installation, software support or software analysis and repair. Seldom requires assistance from support resources to carry out complex or difficult service for in scope activities.  
  
**Your Role And Responsibilities**

* Demonstrates leadership in innovative problem resolution techniques.
* Provides support and assistance to others.
* Services may be directed by a service call management process or be performed as part of a team.
* Possesses an extensive knowledge of complex workstations, personal computers, printers, and mobile computing devices.
* Communicates with IBM management and/or team members on a timely basis to inform regarding status of work, of potential or existing problems, and to seek advice and assistance.
* Maintains business like communications, conduct and appearance, and otherwise demonstrates a courteous, positive and professional attitude at all times.
* Performs a full workload of technical services to IBM employees.
* Makes appropriate use of reference materials, support centers and diagnostic aids.
* Performs problem determination utilizing the diagnostics, reference documentation, service aids, tools and test equipment.
* Diagnoses equipment malfunctions accurately & promptly.
* Fully document all issues in an accurate and timely manner
* With assistance as necessary, analyzes problems in the areas of hardware/software installation, migration and operational services using existing techniques and tools.
* May challenge the validity of and make recommendations for improving the processes and procedures used for services delivery.

**Preferred Education**Bachelor's Degree  
  
**Required Technical And Professional Expertise**

* Excellent Communication as well as Customer service skills and problem-solving ability.
* Mobile Device Skills.
* 2+ years of Strong operational knowledge and experience of Windows, Red Hat Linux, Mac OS, and iOS operating systems, common application programs, system diagnostics and local/remote support structure.
* Experience supporting Outlook, MS Office, MS Teams, OneDrive, Box, and Windows.
* Knowledge of system configuration, physical and network connectivity.
* Ability to provide information and direction to others in a clear and concise manner.
* At least 2 years Windows support experience professionally and/or personally
* At least 2 years professional troubleshooting expertise
* Customer support experience and service focus
* Active listener with flexibility to modify approach and adapt to customer needs

T2 \_L2 Application Support Resources required:  
  

* 5 to 7 years of IT experience of Production Support Team

Technical Skills  
  
Must Have \_ Level 2 Production Support (ITIL) Lead, Unix/Linux, Unix scripting , Oracle SQL, Unix Infra activities experience , Autosys  
  
Incident Management, Change Management , Problem Management , Application COB/Disaster Recovery  
  
Tools: ITRS, Service Now, uDeploy  
  
Domain Knowledge: Banking \_Investment Banking  
  
Good to have : knowledge in oracle \_proc, function, view, cursors  
  
**General Skillset**Good coordination between various infra/TI teams OR dev partners  
  
Quick turnaround time for solving any issue  
  
Quick in escalation + handling MIM + involving ICM + sending user communications  
  
Good debugging and analytical skills  
  
Must be very good in communication  
  
L2 Production support for 24\*7 support module applications

****Job Description**** ****About TaskUs:****  TaskUs is a provider of outsourced digital services and next-generation customer experience to fast-growing technology companies, helping its clients represent, protect and grow their brands. Leveraging a cloud-based infrastructure, TaskUs serves clients in the fastest-growing sectors, including social media, e-commerce, gaming, streaming media, food delivery, ride-sharing, HiTech, FinTech, and HealthTech.  
  
The People First culture at TaskUs has enabled the company to expand its workforce to approximately 45,000 employees globally. Presently, we have a presence in twenty-three locations across twelve countries, which include the Philippines, India, and the United States.  
  
It started with one ridiculously good idea to create a different breed of Business Processing Outsourcing (BPO)! We at TaskUs understand that achieving growth for our partners requires a culture of constant motion, exploring new technologies, being ready to handle any challenge at a moment's notice, and mastering consistency in an ever-changing world.  
  
 ****What We Offer:****  At TaskUs, we prioritize our employees' well-being by offering competitive industry salaries and comprehensive benefits packages. Our commitment to a People First culture is reflected in the various departments we have established, including Total Rewards, Wellness, HR, and Diversity. We take pride in our inclusive environment and positive impact on the community. Moreover, we actively encourage internal mobility and professional growth at all stages of an employee's career within TaskUs. Join our team today and experience firsthand our dedication to supporting People First.  
  
**Job Description******IT Support Specialist****So what does an IT Support Specialist do? Think of yourself as someone who provides assistance and technical support to the business and to team members who are experiencing technical, hardware, or software issues. You are the go-to person for first level technical support for internal customers - to provide resolutions to technical concerns which will result in minimal recurring issues.  
  
As you tackle your new tasks for the day, you know that it will lead to one thing: you will ensure quality service in accordance with departmental standards and guidelines, and provide positive customer service orientation resulting in high customer satisfaction ratings.  
  
**As An **IT Support Specialist** **,** You Will:**

* Respond to telephone calls and email messages from users requesting assistance.
* Log and maintain records of customer/employee queries.
* Interpret problems and analyze possible causes of hardware and software failures.
* Identify malfunctions in computer hardware, software, and telecommunications, and take appropriate action to resolve them while ensuring data and system integrity.
* Conduct tests, configure, install, modify, maintain, and repair computer hardware, operating systems, applications, software patches, and updates as needed.
* Assist in user application testing during program implementation, migration, and system maintenance.
* Perform desktop system maintenance and upgrades, including installing OS patches.
* Create and maintain documentation for instructional procedures such as hardware/software installation.
* Document and maintain knowledge-based troubleshooting techniques.
* Maintain an inventory of company-owned computer hardware assets, peripherals, and software licenses.
* Perform scheduled preventive maintenance of computer systems.
* Troubleshoot and resolve domain-related issues effectively.
* Troubleshoot LAN and network-related issues.
* Join priority calls and actively coordinate with cross-functional teams to resolve critical incidents.
* Provide accurate and timely system, network, and server details to support resolution efforts.
* Minimize downtime by ensuring prompt issue resolution and coordination with relevant teams.
* Handle system imaging for deployment and re-deployment.
* Manage onboarding and offboarding of employees and associated IT assets.
* Be flexible to work in 24x7 shifts and extend working hours when needed to support business continuity.

 **Do you have what it takes to become an **IT Support Specialist?**********Requirements:******

* At least 2-3 years of minimum experience and a Bachelor's Degree in ECE, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or any IT / Computer-related course.
* Knowledge of I.T. systems and equipment as well as their installation, configuration, maintenance, and repair; has vast working knowledge of I.T. requirements/demands in call center operations and corporate organizations - particularly in the area of Operations support; We need someone with above-average problem-solving, decision-making, and analytical skills
* Big plus if you are a skilled technical writer - able to document problems and solutions for customers and other technical support personnel.
* You have good time and project management skill
* Excellent English communication skills - both spoken and written
* You are adaptive to changing work schedules and working hours; excellent customer orientation and interpersonal, customer care skills.

 ****How We Partner To Protect You:****  TaskUs will neither solicit money from you during your application process nor require any form of payment in order to proceed with your application. Kindly ensure that you are always in communication with only authorized recruiters of TaskUs.  
  
 ****DEI:****  In TaskUs we believe that innovation and higher performance are brought by people from all walks of life. We welcome applicants of different backgrounds, demographics, and circumstances. Inclusive and equitable practices are our responsibility as a business. TaskUs is committed to providing equal access to opportunities. If you need reasonable accommodations in any part of the hiring process, please let us know.  
  
We invite you to explore all TaskUs career opportunities and apply through the provided URL  **https://www.taskus.com/careers/ .**TaskUs is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We celebrate and support diversity; we are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. TaskUs people first culture thrives on it for the benefit of our employees, our clients, our services, and our community.  
  
Req Id: R\_2509\_12083  
  
Posted At: Thu Sep 04 2025 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

Direct message the job poster from QualityKiosk Technologies

[Riya S.](https://in.linkedin.com/in/riya-s-a8849a234)
![Click here to view Riya S.’s profile]()

### Riya S.

#### Senior Executive - Talent Acquisition | MBA in Human Resources

**Job Overview:**

We are seeking an Observability & Monitoring Engineer with hands-on experience in Datadog to strengthen our monitoring and incident management capabilities. The ideal candidate will be responsible for proactive monitoring, synthetic monitoring setup, RUM analysis, and end-to-end application health checks. The role involves collaborating closely with development and infrastructure teams to ensure application stability, availability, and performance.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Implement and manage **observability and monitoring solutions** using **Datadog.**

* Perform **proactive monitoring** of applications, databases, and infrastructure to prevent incidents.

* Conduct **RUM (Real User Monitoring) analysis** and coordinate with application development teams to resolve performance/user experience issues.

* Carry out **daily health checks** for applications and databases to ensure smooth operations.

* Create and manage **synthetic monitoring** in Datadog for critical application workflows.

* Enable and configure **log management & processing for hosts** as required.

* Provide **detailed Root Cause Analysis (RCA)** for incidents and service disruptions.

* **Initiate and lead bridge calls** for critical incidents, ensuring timely updates and RCA sharing.

* Optimize and **fine-tune monitoring alerts** to minimize noise and improve accuracy.

* Design and configure new **alerts, dashboards, and monitor**s in Datadog.

**Required Skills & Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

* 1+ years of experience in Application Monitoring/Observability.

* Hands-on expertise in Datadog (RUM, APM, Logs, Infrastructure, Synthetic Monitoring).

* Strong knowledge of incident management processes and RCA preparation.

* Experience working with Application Development teams for issue resolution.

* Good understanding of database monitoring and system performance metrics.

* Ability to lead critical incident bridge calls and communicate effectively with stakeholders.

* Strong troubleshooting, analytical, and problem-solving skills.

**Good to Have (Preferred):**

* Experience with other monitoring tools (e.g., AppDynamics, Dynatrace, Splunk, Prometheus, Grafana).

* Familiarity with ServiceNow / Jira / other ticketing tools.

* Knowledge of ITIL processes (Incident, Problem, and Change Management).

**Soft Skills:**

* Strong communication and coordination skills.

* Ability to work under pressure and in critical situations.

* Proactive mindset with attention to detail.

* Team player with strong ownership qualities.

**Job Title:** IT Business Analysis Expert

**Department:** Digital Solutions

**Reports To:** Solutions Support and Delivery Manager

**Location:** Mumbai

**Employment Type:** Full-Time

**Job description:**

Summary The IT Business Analysis Expert is responsible for supporting and driving the evolution of Maritime ERP applications across the organization. This role includes providing day-to-day technical support, managing and resolving incidents, analysing application issues, and collaborating closely with business stakeholders to capture requirements and translate them into actionable enhancements for the system.

**Your main responsibilities include but not limited to:**

**Application Support**

• Provide level 1 technical support for day-to-day application queries and issues

• Monitor, manage and solve application problems via the dedicated incident management tool (ServiceNOW) within the OLA.

• Document issues, observations and outcomes accurately to escalate issues as required in vendors incident management tool (JIRA) and to ensure the resolution within the SLA.

• Maintain and create documentation for technical troubleshooting and best practices.

• Maintain understanding of company business processes.

**Product Management**

• Identify, capture and translate business requirements for technical discussion.

• Prioritise business needs with Business Stakeholders on the release of functionalities.

• Document the feedback, suggestions and business requirements via the dedicated change management tool.

• Monitor product development to ensure consistency against business requirements.

• Perform functional test on product and coordinate User Acceptance Test with business users.

**Minimum Requirements:**

• At least 3 to 5 years of experience in application support

• Experience in providing front end application support

• Knowledge on product management would be advantageous

• Knowledge of the maritime operational constraints would be advantageous

• Experience in driving product and process improvements would be a plus.

• Fluent in English (written and spoken).

**Key Skills & Personal Attributes:**

• Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

• Goal-oriented and self-motivated with a proactive mindset.

• Ability to multi-task and manage priorities effectively.

• Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

• Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team.

• Skilled at identifying root causes of application issues and implementing solutions

**Company Description**Experian is a global data and technology company, powering opportunities for people and businesses around the world. We help to redefine lending practices, uncover and prevent fraud, simplify healthcare, create marketing solutions, and gain deeper insights into the automotive market, all using our unique combination of data, analytics and software. We also assist millions of people to realize their financial goals and help them save time and money.  
  
We operate across a range of markets, from financial services to healthcare, automotive, agribusiness, insurance, and many more industry segments.  
  
We invest in people and new advanced technologies to unlock the power of data. As a FTSE 100 Index company listed on the London Stock Exchange (EXPN), we have a team of 22,500 people across 32 countries. Our corporate headquarters are in Dublin, Ireland. Learn more at experianplc.com.  
  
**Job Description**The Data Protection Platform Product Manager is a global role that is responsible for the product roadmap and strategic direction for use of Internal and external PKI services, Sectigo suite of products, AWS and Azure based PKI and CLM would be a predominant focus. You will work with business stakeholders, development, operations technical teams and clients to understand application usage, gather requirements, and represent the product by communicating strategy and roadmap.  
  
You have proven experience as the liaison between the business and technical teams. This means collaborating across product teams, predicting future scenarios and needs ahead of others, and most importantly an expert in the needs of our customers and how your products work. You will be responsible for establishing deep product expertise from a product and market perspective by understanding user personas, features and functionality, value proposition, architecture, competitive landscape, and market trends to drive/own the Data Protection platform product strategy. You are a strong communicator, are an influencer and effective at collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders. You keep current leveraging market intelligence, regulatory shifts, end user/client/internal stakeholder feedback to define and prioritize enhancements and new products into a product roadmap.  
  
You are an expert in the Agile framework and driving the adoption of Agile processes and tools. You will also write product requirements, communicate priorities for sprint and release plans, participate in backlog refinement and retrospectives. This role is also responsible for tracking product key performance indicators (KPIs).  
  
**Responsibilities Include**

* Create an ambitious and clear product vision, evangelize, and communicate 'the story' effectively to key stakeholders and the rest of the team
* Define the Data Protection product platform strategy, partner with third party vendors on upcoming product features and build a roadmap for B2B, B2E and B2C spaces, while managing stakeholders across the organization including the business, engineering, and support teams
* Foster a productive working environment by promoting strong interpersonal relationships, give open and honest feedback, encourage team cohesion, and collaborate both internally and with other teams
* Collaborate with cross functional team members to prioritize projects to align with business goals
* Leverage Agile principles and methodologies, including owning the team backlogs, defining, and prioritizing epics, features, user stories and other artifacts to support development goals
* Brings commercial expertise, sound business judgment and draws on external sources to prioritize and help reshape the product vision and roadmap

**Qualifications**

* 7+ years' experience in PKI and Digital certificate Management experience in the following areas:

+ Product Strategy & Roadmap: Define and maintain the PKI service roadmap aligned with business and security goals. Evaluate emerging technologies (e.g., quantum-safe cryptography, certificate automation).
+ Stakeholder Engagement: Collaborate with InfoSec, IT Ops, DevOps, and application teams to understand PKI needs. Act as the voice of the customer for internal/external consumers of PKI services.
+ Service Design & Delivery: Design scalable, secure, and compliant PKI architectures. Ensure high availability, disaster recovery, and lifecycle management of certificates.
+ Governance & Compliance: Ensure PKI service complies with internal policies and external standards (e.g., NIST, ISO 27001). Manage certificate policies, key management practices, and audit readiness.
+ Vendor & Tool Management: Evaluate and manage PKI and CLM vendors
+ Metrics & Reporting: Define KPIs for PKI service performance, adoption, and security posture. Provide regular reporting to leadership and audit teams.
+ Incident & Risk Management: Support incident response related to certificate failures or key compromise. Conduct risk assessments and drive mitigation strategies.

* 7+ years of product management or Service management experience with overall work experience of 10+ years.
* Ability to influence a diverse group of stakeholders, strong leadership skills
* Ability to embrace change and be flexible
* Strong technical understanding and experience in agile delivery/development methodologies
* Experience working with API integration and strong technical understanding of cloud-based platform architecture
* Bachelor's / advanced degree
* ServiceNow experience preferred Technical Skills
* Deep understanding of PKI concepts: CAs, CRLs, OCSP, key pairs, certificate formats, Certificate lifecycle and Certificate use cases.
* Familiarity with cryptographic standards (RSA, ECC, SHA-2, etc.).
* Experience with certificate lifecycle automation and integration (e.g., ACME protocol).
* Knowledge of HSMs, secure key storage, and cryptographic APIs.

**Additional Information**Our uniqueness is that we celebrate yours. Experian's culture and people are important differentiators. We take our people agenda very seriously and focus on what matters; DEI, work/life balance, development, authenticity, collaboration, wellness, reward & recognition, volunteering... the list goes on. Experian's people first approach is award-winning; World's Best Workplaces™ 2024 (Fortune Top 25), Great Place To Work™ in 24 countries, and Glassdoor Best Places to Work 2024 to name a few. Check out Experian Life on social or our Careers Site to understand why.  
  
Experian is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer. Innovation is an important part of Experian's DNA and practices, and our diverse workforce drives our success. Everyone can succeed at Experian and bring their whole self to work, irrespective of their gender, ethnicity, religion, colour, sexuality, physical ability or age. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know at the earliest opportunity.

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fapplication-support-engineer-%25E2%2580%2593-ticket-management-0%25E2%2580%25936-months-experience-at-opkey-4325542215&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**Who We Are**At Opkey, we empower enterprises to maximize their ERP investments using cutting-edge, agentic AI-powered automation. Our intelligent platform provides continuous assurance across the entire ERP lifecycle—from implementation to upgrades to long-term digital transformation.  
  
By eliminating manual effort, accelerating testing cycles, and ensuring smooth adoption of Oracle quarterly updates, Opkey enables organizations to modernize with confidence and agility. Trusted by 250+ global enterprises, we reduce risk, drive operational efficiency, cut costs, and fast-track innovation—so businesses can focus on what matters most: growing and evolving in a dynamic digital world.  
  
**About The Role**We’re looking for an enthusiastic **Application Support Engineer** who is just starting their career (0–6 months of experience) and eager to learn. In this role, you will support our ticket management operations, assist clients with technical issues, and ensure smooth day-to-day application performance.  
  
This is an excellent opportunity for freshers or early-entry engineers who want to grow in application support, production troubleshooting, and client-facing communication.  
  
**What You’ll Do**

* Monitor and manage incoming support tickets in the ticketing system.
* Assist in investigating and troubleshooting basic technical and production issues.
* Work with senior engineers to ensure timely resolution as per SLAs.
* Communicate with clients professionally, providing updates and clarifications.
* Support production operations and escalate issues as needed.
* Collaborate with internal teams (QA, Engineering, Product) for faster issue resolution.
* Be flexible to work in 24/7 rotational shifts.

**What We’re Looking For**

* 0–6 months of experience (freshers welcome).
* Basic understanding of ticket management systems (Jira, Teams, or similar is a plus).
* Ability to troubleshoot simple technical issues.
* Good communication and client-handling skills.
* Ability to stay calm under pressure and work in a fast-paced environment.
* Willingness to work in rotational shifts including nights.
* Strong learning attitude and eagerness to grow in application support.

**Bonus Points If You Have**

* Basic knowledge of logs, debugging, or system admin concepts.
* Awareness of ITIL or service management processes.
* Internship or project experience in technical support or operations.

**Why You’ll Love Working Here**

* Friendly and collaborative team environment.
* Great learning opportunity for early-career engineers.
* Hands-on exposure to real-world production and application support.
* Career growth path into advanced support, DevOps, QA, or engineering roles.
* Competitive compensation and benefits.

Skills: support tickets,ticket management systems,application support

**About Coursera**Coursera was founded in 2012 by Stanford professors Andrew Ng and Daphne Koller to make world-class learning accessible to everyone, everywhere. Today, over 190 million learners and 375+ university and industry partners use our platform to gain skills in fields like AI, data science, technology, and business. As a Delaware public benefit corporation and Certified B Corp, we’re driven by the belief that learning can transform lives through learning.  
  
**Why Join Us**At Coursera, we’re looking for inventors, innovators, and lifelong learners ready to shape the future of education. You’ll help build global programs and tools that power online learning for millions turning bold ideas into real impact. People who thrive here are customer-first builders who move fast, simplify ruthlessly, and iterate relentlessly on the metrics that matter.  
  
We’re a globally distributed team and let you choose the best way you work, whether it's from home, a Coursera hub, or a co-working space near you. Our virtual hiring and onboarding make it easy to join us and start making an impact from anywhere. If you’re ready to make a global impact, scale unique products exclusive to Coursera, and expand your career horizons, apply below.  
  
**Job Overview:**Coursera’s IT Department is responsible for the Corporate tools and technology that are required for the company to operate efficiently and effectively. We are a growing team that plays an integral role in the company’s ability to perform its day-to-day tasks. While supporting an ever-growing number of users with top-tier tools and applications, our IT team is always aiming to achieve the highest goals and produce the best experience possible for our end users.  
  
Coursera is looking for a motivated IT Support Specialist to help support our growing team and ensure our staff has the optimal technical working environment. This is an internal support position which requires versatility, attention to detail, a strong sense of urgency and troubleshooting skills. In this role, you will be the front-facing contact to manage IT requests ranging from break/fix issues, SaaS administration, asset management, hardware deployment, user onboarding & offboarding, A/V support (meetings/All hands/events etc) and some IT project participation. As part of a small IT team, you'll wear lots of hats and gain plenty of valuable experience.  
  
The role provides an opportunity to enhance your IT skills by providing first-line support to Courserians with their IT service requirements and needs. The role also allows for the successful candidate to further identify their IT path and align their career aspirations with the different IT fields, from basic computer fundamentals to server administration, application support, and other technology opportunities.  
  
**Responsibilities:**

* Responsible for Global IT Support for 1500+ systems (95% Mac and 5% Windows & VDI), experience with end-user support by responding to client queries, solving technical problems including client software, hardware and network system problems. Support the business needs in the office as per the requirement.
* Daily duties can include receiving, prioritizing, documenting, routing, scheduling, help with general IT support, technical troubleshooting, documentation, Audio/Video support, project management and resolving all internal IT support requests related to hardware and software to the role limits.

**Conduct New Hire training, including orientation on company IT platforms and tool familiarity, troubleshooting, and configuration assistance.**

* Provide technical assistance/training to the team members and act as a liaison with the Systems and Network Administration team(s).
* Manage hardware in relation to the hardware asset lifecycle and provide support in SaaS asset management such as auditing, access retrieval, etc.
* Create and maintain knowledge content to promote self-service support and provide feedback and recommendations to improve processes, productivity, and quality of service.
* You need to support operations during Indian holidays covering UK business hours.

**Basic Qualifications:**

* 2+ years of IT or Desktop Support / System Administration with a demonstrated history of providing exceptional customer service.
* Extensive experience with configuring & troubleshooting Mac OS is a must.
* Extensive experience with configuring & troubleshooting Windows 10 and higher will be an advantage.
* Experience with various IT tools and SaaS applications: Google Suite, JAMF, Zoom, ServiceNow, Virus Scan, Microsoft Office, Slack, Okta etc.
* Demonstrated ability to communicate ideas to technical and non-technical audiences in both written and verbal formats.
* Inquisitive attitude and a desire to learn new things.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience with intermediate systems/network troubleshooting skills,MAC administration, Workspace One, IT Service management tool like Service Now along with SSO technology is a must.
* Demonstrating training skills for non-technical users.
* Certifications to look out for: CompTIA A+, CompTIA Security+, CompTIA Network+ will be an additional advantage.

**If this opportunity interests you, you might like these courses on Coursera:**

* Service Desk Analyst: Jobs, Courses, Salaries, and Career Paths - https://www.coursera.org/articles/service-desk-analyst
* Google IT Support Professional Certificate - https://www.coursera.org/professional-certificates/google-it-support
* Bachelor of Information Technology from Illinois State - https://www.coursera.org/degrees/bach-information-technology-illinois-tech

Coursera is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to building a welcoming and inclusive workplace. We consider all qualified applicants without regard to legally protected characteristics and provide reasonable accommodations upon request at accommodations@coursera.org. Learn more in our CCPA Applicant Notice and GDPR Recruitment Notice.

Direct message the job poster from Lepton Software

[Nisha .](https://in.linkedin.com/in/nisha-51033a197)
![Click here to view Nisha .’s profile]()

### Nisha .

#### --

**(A) JOB SUMMARY:**

We are looking for an experienced and highly motivated L1 Application support engineer to be part of a skilled team of Service support team

**(B) JOB RESPONSIBILITY:**

* Provide technical support to users on GIS based application
* Handle all issues assigned by customer/user directly
* Evaluate issues, troubleshoot and provide resolution
* Ensure that all the operational processes and SLA are strictly followed
* Co-ordinate with L2 & L3 support team members to get the status of issues that have been transferred
* Provide application support during outage/degrade or any enhancements.
* Ensure that the data feeds required by the application are loaded properly into the solution by the automated modules.
* Need to interact with stakeholder regarding the resolution of issues.
* Perform incident/change/release management activities
* Troubleshoot end user problems
* Work well in a high energy, fast paced, enthusiastic, positive, and collaborative culture
* Required to report to Customer Operational Manager.
* Ready to work in 24\*7 shift (rotational on weekly /bi-weekly).

**(C) QUALIFICATION & SKILLSET**

* 2 - 4 Years of Experience
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
* Technical knowledge of GIS application is must. Eg. MapInfo, QGIS, etc.
* Knowledge about application integration (integrated with other systems to receive data/information)
* Knowledge of complete Data flow in the system.
* ITIL certification is preferred (Good to have…)
* Knowledge in Telecom wireline would be an advantage

Direct message the job poster from PwC

[Abhishek Upadhyay (AC Kolkata)](https://in.linkedin.com/in/abhishek-upadhyay-ac-kolkata-974300289)
![Click here to view Abhishek Upadhyay (AC Kolkata)’s profile]()

### Abhishek Upadhyay (AC Kolkata)

#### Senior Associate\_IFS\_Talent Acquisition

At PwC, our people in information technology operations focus on managing and maintaining the technology infrastructure and systems to provide smooth operations and efficient delivery of IT services. This includes monitoring network performance, troubleshooting issues, and implementing security measures. Those in IT operations support at PwC will focus on providing technical assistance and troubleshooting to provide smooth functioning of IT systems and non-cloud based infrastructure. Your role will focus on providing L1 and possibly L2 support.

Growing as a strategic advisor, you leverage your influence, expertise, and network to deliver quality results. You motivate and coach others, coming together to solve complex problems. As you increase in autonomy, you apply sound judgment, recognising when to take action and when to escalate. You are expected to solve through complexity, ask thoughtful questions, and clearly communicate how things fit together. Your ability to develop and sustain high performing, diverse, and inclusive teams, and your commitment to excellence, contributes to the success of our Firm.

**Skills**

Examples of the skills, knowledge, and experiences you need to lead and deliver value at this level include but are not limited to:

* Craft and convey clear, impactful and engaging messages that tell a holistic story.
* Apply systems thinking to identify underlying problems and/or opportunities.
* Validate outcomes with clients, share alternative perspectives, and act on client feedback.
* Direct the team through complexity, demonstrating composure through ambiguous, challenging and uncertain situations.
* Deepen and evolve your expertise with a focus on staying relevant.
* Initiate open and honest coaching conversations at all levels.
* Make difficult decisions and take action to resolve issues hindering team effectiveness.
* Model and reinforce professional and technical standards (e.g. refer to specific PwC tax and audit guidance), the Firm's code of conduct, and independence requirements.

The Opportunity

When you join PwC Acceleration Centers (ACs), you step into a pivotal role focused on actively supporting various Acceleration Center services, from Advisory to Assurance, Tax and Business Services. In our innovative hubs, you’ll engage in challenging projects and provide distinctive services to support client engagements through enhanced quality and innovation. You’ll also participate in dynamic and digitally enabled training that is designed to grow your technical and professional skills.

As part of the Application Support team you will provide hands-on technical support and take ownership of the end-to-end management of Tax applications hosted on Azure. As a Senior Manager you will lead large projects, innovate processes, and maintain operational excellence while interacting with clients at a significant level to drive project success. This role offers the chance to mentor junior staff, enhance your technical skills, and collaborate with a global team to enable seamless support and knowledge continuity.

**Responsibilities**

* Provide hands-on technical support for Tax applications on Azure
* Oversee the overall management of application processes
* Lead and drive large-scale projects to enhance operational effectiveness
* Mentor and develop junior team members to build proficiency
* Collaborate with global teams to promote knowledge sharing
* Innovate and implement process enhancements for seamless support
* Maintain client interactions to promote project success
* Uphold standards of operational excellence in every activity

What You Must Have

* Bachelor's Degree
* 7 years of experience in hands-on application support and management
* Oral and written proficiency in English required

What Sets You Apart

* Experience with Azure cloud platforms
* Skilled in scripting and automation
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines
* Understanding of ITIL processes
* Mentoring junior engineers
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills
* Experience with monitoring tools
* Knowledge of Identity Management principles

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fapplication-support-engineer-mumbai-at-susquehanna-international-group-4132681279&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**Overview**Susquehanna is seeking an Application Support Engineer to join the trading technology team in Mumbai. In this role, you will perform support, deployment and automate tasks related to the management of Susquehanna's trading systems throughout the Asia Pacific region.  
  
The position offers the opportunity to be involved in scripting and automation tasks to improve the monitoring, management, and deployment of trading systems on both the Windows and Linux operating systems. You'l get exposure to state-of-the-art trading systems and work as part of a high-performing team. This is a fantastic opportunity for someone who wants to grow and develop their skillset in a well established HFT.  
  
**What We're Looking For**

* 5+ years of experience in application support, deployment and monitoring
* Minimum of 3 years of commercial experience in the Financial Industry particularly trading, market making, options, market data, OMS, and/or other related systems
* Must have strong technical skills in scripting, Python, PowerShell, C#, or other programming languages
* Experience with working with instrument static data and/or other Market Data systems & protocols
* Experience in both Windows and Linux operating systems
* Experience in messaging systems, and experience debugging network protocols such as TCP, multicast, would be highly regarded
* Degree with a major in Computer Science, or a related technical discipline.

**What’s In It For You**

* Our flat hierarchy enables you to drive meaningful impact, by leveraging your expertise and taking ownership.
* Greenfield impact: newly created role as we scale across APAC.
* Private healthcare and wellness initiatives.
* Daily office lunch allowance
* Employee Assistance and Education Assistance Progams
* Matched donations and corporate discounts.

**About Susquehanna**Susquehanna is a global quantitative trading firm powered by scientific rigor, curiosity, and innovation. Our culture is intellectually driven and highly collaborative, bringing together researchers, engineers, and traders to design and deploy impactful strategies in our systematic trading environment. To meet the unique challenges of global markets, Susquehanna applies machine learning and advanced quantitative research to vast datasets in order to uncover actionable insights and build effective strategies. By uniting deep market expertise with cutting-edge technology, we excel in solving complex problems and pushing boundaries together.  
  
**What We Do**Susquehanna’s deep integration of trading, technology and quant research makes us experts in trading essentially all listed financial products and asset classes, with a focus on derivatives. We handle millions of trading transactions around the world every day as both a market maker and market taker. Our efforts provide liquidity and ensure competitive prices for buyers and sellers. While our presence in the market is broad, our trading desks are highly specialized to allow for a deep understanding of the unique drivers of each asset class.  
  
**Equal Opportunity statement**We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace. We encourage candidates from all backgrounds to apply and are happy to provide reasonable accommodations during the hiring process.  
  
If you're a recruiting agency and want to partner with us, please reach out to recruiting@sig.com . Any resume or referral submitted in the absence of a signed agreement will not be eligible for an agency fee.

Title/Position: GitHub Admin  
Job Location: Pune / Gurugram  
Experience: 5+ Years  
Employment Type: Full Time  
Shift Timings: UK Shift

Job Description:

We are looking for an experienced GitHub Administrator & Application Support Engineer with at least 5 years of hands-on expertise in managing GitHub Enterprise environments and supporting critical applications. The role involves administering GitHub repositories, ensuring secure and efficient CI/CD workflows, and providing technical support for enterprise applications. The ideal candidate will be a proactive problem solver with strong collaboration skills and a passion for DevOps and application reliability.

Responsibilities:

GitHub Administration

· Manage and administer GitHub Enterprise accounts, repositories, organizations, and teams.

· Configure and enforce security policies, access controls, and compliance standards.

· Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and integrations with other DevOps tools.

· Monitor repository health, performance, and usage metrics.

Application Support

· Provide Level 1/2 support for enterprise applications integrated with GitHub.

· Troubleshoot issues related to builds, deployments, and integrations.

· Collaborate with developers, QA, and operations teams to resolve incidents and service requests.

· Document solutions, create knowledge base articles, and train users when required.

Maintenance & Monitoring

· Apply patches, upgrades, and enhancements to GitHub and related applications.

· Perform routine system health checks and performance tuning.

· Ensure compliance with IT security and governance policies.

Collaboration & Stakeholder Engagement

· Partner with engineering teams to optimize workflows and improve developer productivity.

· Communicate effectively with stakeholders regarding issue resolution, system changes, and best practices.

· Support audits and compliance reviews by providing documentation and evidence.

Continuous Improvement

· Identify opportunities for automation and process optimization.

· Stay updated with GitHub features, DevOps trends, and industry best practices.

· Participate in system upgrades, migrations, and integration projects.

Requirements:

· Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field

· Minimum 5 years of experience in GitHub Enterprise administration and application support.

· Strong knowledge of GitHub Actions, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.

· Experience with integration tools (Jenkins, Azure DevOps, Jira, ServiceNow, etc.).

· Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash, PowerShell) for automation.

· Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).

· Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.

· Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical users.

· Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.

· Strong customer service orientation and a passion for delivering exceptional support to clients.

About Stratacent  
  
Stratacent is an IT Consulting and Services firm, headquartered in Jersey City, NJ, with two global delivery centres in New York City area and New Delhi area plus offices in London, Canada and Pune, India. We are a leading IT services provider focusing in Financial Services, Insurance, Healthcare and Life Sciences. We help our customers in their digital transformation journey and provides services/ solutions around Cloud Infrastructure, Data and Analytics, Automation, Application Development and ITSM. We have partnerships with SAS, Automation Anywhere, Snowflake, Azure, AWS and GCP. (To learn more: www.stratacent.com ).  
  
Employee Benefits:

· Group Medical Insurance

· Cab facility

· Meals/snacks

· Continuous Learning Program

Stratacent India Private Limited is an equal opportunity employer and will not discriminate against any employee or applicant for employment on the basis of race, color, creed, religion, age, sex, national origin, ancestry, handicap, or any other factors.

Direct message the job poster from Indsafri

[Anvesh Lanka](https://in.linkedin.com/in/anveshl)
![Click here to view Anvesh Lanka’s profile]()

### Anvesh Lanka

#### Senior Consultant

**Job Description:**

**Job Tile: Tech Process Analyst – Banking & Software Delivery**

**Location: Chennai, Tamil Nadu**

**Contract: 1 Year**

**Role Purpose**

We are looking for a Tech Process Analyst to support the organization in diagnosing and resolving challenges within the software development and implementation lifecycle. The role will partner with Processing Engineering to analyze pain points across technology delivery, strengthen process governance, and improve the speed and quality of system rollouts in a banking environment.

**Required Qualifications & Experience**

* Degree in **Industrial Engineering**, **Process Engineering**, **Systems Engineering**, or related field.
* 2–5 years’ experience in **banking**, **technology delivery**, or a similar regulated environment.
* Experience working with **software development teams** (Agile/Scrum, DevOps, or hybrid environments).
* Strong understanding of **SDLC**, system implementation processes, and IT governance frameworks.
* Proven experience in process mapping, optimisation, and root-cause analysis (Lean, Six Sigma, BPMN, etc.).

**Nice-to-Have**

* Exposure to **Salesforce** (Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, CRM, or platform configuration concepts).
* Experience in release management, QA/test coordination, or application support.
* Knowledge of banking regulatory requirements influence system design and delivery (e.g., data privacy, risk controls, audit requirements).

L2 Application Support
======================



#### [Persistent Systems](https://in.linkedin.com/company/persistent-systems?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Pune, Maharashtra, India 3 weeks ago Over 200 applicants [See who Persistent Systems has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D5034%26title%3DApplication%2BSupport%2BSpecialist&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

Apply
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fl2-application-support-at-persistent-systems-4347897091&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fl2-application-support-at-persistent-systems-4347897091&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**About Position:**

We are hiring for 5 to 9 years in L2 Application Support. Japan shift (5:30am to 2:30pm IST)

* **Role: L2 Application Support**
* **Location: Pune/Hyderabad/Bangalore**
* **Experience: 5 to 9 Years**
* **Job Type: Full Time Employment**

**What You'll Do:**

* 5-9 years of experience in global systems support, with emphasis on the Market Risk domain.
* Experience with key financial industry data domains (e.g. reference data, market data etc.)
* Understanding of financial products (Rates, FX, Equities, Credit, Commodities, etc) and familiarity with risk metrics (VaR, FRTB, sensitivities, stress tests)
* Proficiency in Japanese language

**Expertise You'll Bring:**

* Experience of working in agile teams
* Configuration & release management.
* ITIL certification
* Strong communication, coordination and incident management capabilities
* Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
* Ability to handle multiple work streams and assignments simultaneously.

**Benefits:**

* Competitive salary and benefits package
* Culture focused on talent development with quarterly growth opportunities and company-sponsored higher education and certifications
* Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies
* Employee engagement initiatives such as project parties, flexible work hours, and Long Service awards
* Annual health check-ups
* Insurance coverage: group term life, personal accident, and Mediclaim hospitalization for self, spouse, two children, and parents

**Values-Driven, People-Centric & Inclusive Work Environment:**

Persistent Ltd. is dedicated to fostering diversity and inclusion in the workplace. We invite applications from all qualified individuals, including those with disabilities, and regardless of gender or gender preference. We welcome diverse candidates from all backgrounds.

* We support hybrid work and flexible hours to fit diverse lifestyles.
* Our office is accessibility-friendly, with ergonomic setups and assistive technologies to support employees with physical disabilities.
* If you are a person with disabilities and have specific requirements, please inform us during the application process or at any time during your employment

**Let’s unleash your full potential at Persistent - persistent.com/careers**

***“Persistent is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind.”***

Direct message the job poster from WAISL Limited

[Sunil Menon](https://ae.linkedin.com/in/sunil-menon21)
![Click here to view Sunil Menon’s profile]()

### Sunil Menon

#### UAE l Saudi Arabia | Qatar | Egypt | APAC | India | UK

**Head Digital Transformation & Application Support**

A unique leadership role to enable and drive Digital Transformation and Innovation in the Aviation

Industry. Opportunity to help develop and build best in class Airport Core Architecture and AI

based innovative solutions for airport customers. This will involve all aspects of technology

architecture, innovative software solutions (including cloud-based services), hardware, networks

and the associated services. The role would be liaising extensively with airport stakeholders and

would be instrumental in taking key decisions for the growth of the organization. The role would

be a key driver for company to achieve its objective of becoming an Industry leader and the

preferred Airport IT Services provider. The candidate should understand digital industry trends

transportation sector and possess proven expertise in designing and developing digital solutions.

The candidate is expected to collaborate closely with internal Commercial, Operations and Project

Delivery teams to drive best in class solutions and enable the growth of the Company. The

candidate will directly report to the COO and build and lead a team of domain architects (COEs,

Products) and SMEs. Enable organization build innovative service offerings.

**Roles & Responsibilities**

• Visualize the Digital Transformation of "Airport IT Services & Operations" through Innovation.

• Lead the development and architecture of the Core Airport IT (Airport IT) digital airport

Platform and associated application solutions.

• Adopt leading COEs, Products teams and systems Engineering, software development, integration,

testing and QA methodologies to ensure that the evolution of the Airport IT Platform is achieved

on time and within budget.

• Coordinate closely with the leadership team to ensure that the Airport IT Platform evolves to

support the business plan and successive AOP's

• Explore and develop digital technologies and assess their value

• Study the latest technologies and conceptualize the best use cases for Airports.

• Lead and Develop incubation labs to build products & services to create new value

• Continuously assess airport digital business solutions as candidates for integration in the Platform

• Create a team of solution integration SME's to evolve the Airports IT Platform.

• Provide training / mentoring resources to the architecture, integration and development teams.

• Closely interact with OEM's, solution providers and Clients to support the solution build and

business development.

• Generate revenues with Digital Solutions and Product developments.

• Cost saving by implementing digital technologies/ automation for IT operations and services.

• Be an evangelist for digital transformation in the Airport IT Services & Operations and represent

company in external forums.

• Be a thought leader in this space.

**Required Skills**

• Engineering Degree or Masters (Mathematics, Science, IT).

• 18+ years related work experience in product/platform/AI/solutions development iith 10 years in

a leadership role in IT Services & Operations, Aviation and transport industries experience iill be

advantageous.

• Has demonstrated Thought Leadership

• Has formed and led technology teams that have developed notable digital innovations.

• Understanding of AI, IT Applications, IT Infrastructure, Database & Networks and programming

languages.

• Extensive experience in large scale systems integration and large systems architecture.

• Has worked in solutions development / integration with large complex, transactional, real time

systems environments.

• Successful team leader with proven leadership skills.

• Very familiar with IT Services & IT operations of complex and large scale infrastructure

environments.

• Articulate and good communication skills.

• Comfortable leading projects and programs and managing at a detailed level.

• Very familiar with digital innovation in IT operations

• Very familiar with Predictive technologies, Incidence Avoidance etc

• Demonstrated ability to analyze business requirements mapped to digital technology trends so as to derive high level architecture and integrated solutions.

• Experienced in Platform architectures and challenges

• Should possess extensive detailed working knowledge and acumen in the technology domains.

• Enterprise architecture best practices, including, but not limited to, digital, logical and physical

architectures, network communications, operating systems, applications, data base servers,

application servers, web servers, server consolidation, server network and storage performance,

server and storage virtualization & capacity planning and cloud services.

**What is in store for you?**

• An opportunity to define, lead and coordinate first of its kind Airport IT platform enabled using

digital technologies — Al/ML, Cloud and I0T

• Build a best-in-class IT Operations Architecture

• An opportunity to work in a diverse environment addressing the global market.

• Liaise extensively with customer stakeholders and IT industry peers.

**Company Profile**

WAISL appraised digital transformation partner for businesses across industries with a core focus on aviation and related adjacencies. We transform airports and relative ecosystems through digital

interventions with a strong service excellence culture. As a leader in our chosen space, we deliver

world-class services focused on airports and their related domains, enabled through outcome-

focused next-gen digital/technology solutions.

At present, WAISL is the primary technology solutions partner for Indira Gandhi International

Airport, Delhi, Rajiv Gandhi International Airport, Hyderabad, Manohar International Airport, Goa,

Kannur International Airport, Kerala, and Kuwait International Airport, and expect to soon

provide similar services for other airports in India and globally. WAISL, as a digital transformation

partner, brings proven credibility in managing and servicing 135+Mn passengers, 80+ airlines, core

integration, deployment, and real-time management experience of 2000+ applications vendor

agnostically in highly complex technology converging ecosystems. This excellence in managed

services delivered by WAISL has enabled its customer airports to be rated amongst the best-in-

class service providers by Skytrax and ACI awards, and to in many innovations and excellence

awards.

At WAISL, we aim to streamline hoi enterprises and industries operate through technology. We

implement and integrate technologies that enhance efficiency and transform processes from

airports and smart cities to energy and hospitality. Our solutions—spanning biometric systems,

digital twins, integrated command and control centers, cyber security/sustainability suites,

predictive data-driven insights, etc.—work together seamlessly to deliver more innovative,

efficient, and intuitive experiences elevating business outcomes.

At WAISL - We don’t just innovate; redefine what’s possible. WAISL - Your Preferred Digital

Transformation Partner.

### Pavithra Christopher

#### --

**BPA ( Business Process Analyst)**

**Experience – 4 to 8 years(relevant only)**

**Location – Bangalore,Pune, Gurgaon, Noida, Hyderabad, Chennai, Kolkata, Coimbatore, Kochi, Trivandrum.**

**Interview rounds – L1 Technical + L2 – Client round Technical + US round.**

* **Telecom Business Process Modeling,**
* **TMForum standards: eTOM, ODA, SID, Open APIs,**
* **Understanding of Telecom Value Chain: Must possess a strong understanding of telecom value chain, Lead to Cash, Trouble to Resolve, Assurance, OSS processes, Network Inventory Management and Billing.**
* **Experience in consulting in Telco OSS and BSS**
* **Experience in developing OSS/BSS Transformation Roadmaps**
* **Significant knowledge and experience gained from years of OSS / BSS domain (Lead & Opportunity, CPQ, Order Capture, Order Orchestration, Inventory, Provisioning, Billing etc) delivery and implementation.**
* **Experience in products from Product vendors such as Netcracker, Amdocs, Ericsson, Salesforce, ServiceNow, SAP etc**
* **Good to have: Understanding of Autonomous Networks**

**Company Description**NEC Software Solutions (India) Private Limited! is based in Mumbai (Worli & Airoli) and  
  
Bangalore with an employee strength of 1300+. It is one of the foremost providers of end-  
  
to-end IT services across various sectors. We work with diverse industry verticals which  
  
include publishing, media, financial services, retail, healthcare and technology companies  
  
around the world. Our customers range from two-person startups to $bn listed companies.  
  
We have more than 30 years of experience in providing end to end IT services across the  
  
globe and have earned a reputation for delighting our customers by consistently surpassing  
  
expectations and helping them deliver robust, market-ready software products that meet  
  
the highest standards of engineering and user experience. Supported by more than 1300  
  
exceptionally talented manpower, we are a hub for offshore support and technology  
  
services.  
  
**Job Description****Job Description – Application Senior Support Consultant*****Reporting Structure****Reports to Project / Programme Manager/ UK Project Lead****Requisites*****Education:**B.E. or equivalent  
  
**Experience (years):** At least 4+ years of experience working in application support  
  
**Industry / Technology background:** Application implementation , Maintenance and Support (any domain).  
  
**Location:**Mumbai  
  
**Working Hours:**Full Time UK Hours  
  
**(Standard Rave] Pre-employment checks:**Required  
  
**Key Functions**Join our Customer Support Operations group and be part of a dynamic team responsible for resolving application support issues for our client solution. As a member of our team, you will provide technical assistance, application support, and guidance to NEC customers. You will also work towards meeting SLAs and ensuring customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem resolution.  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
  

* Provide technical assistance and application support to customers, demonstrating in-depth knowledge of application environments.
* Understand contractual commitments and resolve incidents/problems within contracted SLAs.
* Translate customer requirements into workarounds and solutions.
* Develop and implement technical support procedures/documentation.
* Proactively deliver support services and identify revenue generation opportunities.

Requirement is working UK hours , Monday to Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm on Rota basis .  
  
***Competencies* Essential:**

* Proven experience supporting Web Applications
* Proficiency in SQL scripting and database administration
* Experience of delivering support to users

**Technologies Hands-on Experience (Years) Priority**supporting Web Applications  
  
5+
