**Desirable:**

* It is highly desirable for candidates to have experience with NEC software and related applications.
* Familiarity with administering operating systems e.g. Microsoft Windows/Linux/Solaris.
* Experience with application delivery tools like Citrix.
* Understanding of software development principles in an ISO 9001 environment.
* Experience creating reports using Business Objects or similar tools.

**Personal Skills & Attributes:**

* Communicate problems in a timely manner to the Tech Lead, Project Manager
* Ability to handle Pressure when required
* Establishes and maintains agreed standards applicable to the work undertaken and ensures that the team adheres to
* Is a good team player
* Ability to remain calm in adverse situation and act wisely
* Ability to communicate and collaborate effectively with team members located elsewhere within the UK and India
* Demonstrate an enthusiastic and pro-active approach to software development
* Demonstrate the desire to produce high quality software products within agreed budget and timescale constraints
* The ability to pro-actively suggest and implement process improvements that enhance the performance, productivity and morale of the team
* The ability to work flexibly and imaginatively in a changing and evolving project environment.

**Qualifications**Graduate

Weekday AI (YC W21) provided pay range
--------------------------------------

This range is provided by Weekday AI (YC W21). Your actual pay will be based on your skills and experience — talk with your recruiter to learn more.

### Base pay range

₹1,000,000.00/yr - ₹1,600,000.00/yr

**This role is for one of the Weekday's clients****Salary range: Rs 1000000 - Rs 1600000 (ie INR 10-16 LPA)**Min Experience: 15 years  
  
Location: Pune  
  
JobType: full-time  
  
The Director - Information Technology will lead the design and implementation of the Digital Transformation Strategy aligned with the long-term institutional vision. This role focuses on building a technology-driven, future-ready organisation by enhancing academic delivery, operational excellence, and stakeholder experience. The ideal candidate will bring strategic leadership, strong technical expertise, and proven experience in managing large-scale digital transformation within a complex institutional environment.  
  
**Requirements******Key Accountability******Strategic Responsibilities**

* Develop and implement a comprehensive Digital Transformation Strategy aligned with institutional goals.
* Lead technology-driven initiatives that improve operational efficiency, academic systems, and stakeholder experiences.
* Position the IT function as a strategic enabler for academic, administrative, and research excellence.
* Continuously research global innovations in education technology and recommend best-fit solutions.
* Establish and enforce Information Security and Data Protection policies, governance frameworks, and compliance processes.
* Drive innovation in digital platforms including online learning systems, classroom technologies, hybrid programs, and emerging EdTech solutions.

**Operational Responsibilities**

* Oversee the development, maintenance, and performance of all institutional websites.
* Understand stakeholder needs, analyze market trends and competition, and ensure digital products and systems deliver superior user experience.
* Establish and maintain an Integrated Data Centre ensuring 100% uptime, scalability, and optimal performance.
* Monitor and improve performance of IT infrastructure including servers, networks, and Wi-Fi systems.
* Integrate student and faculty feedback into future digital initiatives and upgrades.
* Manage IT support across departments including Examination, ERP, Admissions, Records, Institutional Relations, Media, Events, Seminars, and Conferences.

****Collaboration & Stakeholder Management****

* Lead procurement efforts including vendor evaluation, technology assessment, and cost-effective solution selection.
* Build strong relationships with academic and operational leadership to support the adoption of digital tools.
* Promote awareness of emerging technologies and facilitate institution-wide digital literacy.
* Represent technology initiatives in senior forums and external academic or industry partnerships.

****Person Specification******Technical & Leadership Experience**

* Significant senior leadership experience managing IT in a technology-intensive or large enterprise environment.
* Proven expertise in leading organisation-wide digital transformation initiatives.
* Demonstrated ability to deliver measurable improvements in quality, efficiency, and technology adoption.
* Strong financial acumen, including budgeting, resource planning, and optimisation.
* Experienced in governance, compliance, and working with regulatory or board-level stakeholders.
* Proven ability to build, lead, and develop high-performing technology teams.

****External Relations & Engagement****

* Strong capability to represent the organisation at senior regional or national platforms.
* Experience establishing industry partnerships and building external engagement opportunities.

****Personal Attributes & Leadership Style****

* Strong commitment to institutional mission, values, and long-term goals.
* Inclusive, collaborative leadership style with exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.
* Sound judgment, integrity, and ability to make clear decisions in complex environments.
* Highly motivated, innovation-driven, and adaptable to a high-growth culture.

**Minimum Qualifications & Experience**

* 15-20 years of professional IT experience with expertise in enterprise systems and digital transformation.
* Strong stakeholder engagement and user-centric implementation skills.
* Proven experience managing multiple priorities in large-scale environments.
* Deep understanding of digital platforms, enterprise solutions, data management, and user experience design.
* Graduate or Postgraduate degree in IT, Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related fields.
* Strong knowledge of IT standards, protocols, and governance frameworks.
* Project management certifications such as PMP, Prince2, Agile, or equivalent are preferred.
* Hands-on experience in digital strategy, digital commerce, content management, mobile apps, or digital analytics.

****Communication & Working Relationships******Internal:** Academic & non-academic leaders, operational departments, and senior leadership teams  
  
**External:** IT vendors, regulatory bodies  
  
**Skills:** Information Technology | Digital Transformation | Enterprise Systems | Stakeholder Management | IT Governance | Leadership

**Company Description**NEC Software Solutions (India) Private Limited! is based in Mumbai (Worli & Airoli) and  
  
Bangalore with an employee strength of 1300+. It is one of the foremost providers of end-  
  
to-end IT services across various sectors. We work with diverse industry verticals which  
  
include publishing, media, financial services, retail, healthcare and technology companies  
  
around the world. Our customers range from two-person startups to $bn listed companies.  
  
We have more than 30 years of experience in providing end to end IT services across the  
  
globe and have earned a reputation for delighting our customers by consistently surpassing  
  
expectations and helping them deliver robust, market-ready software products that meet  
  
the highest standards of engineering and user experience. Supported by more than 1300  
  
exceptionally talented manpower, we are a hub for offshore support and technology  
  
services.  
  
**Job Description****Job Description – Application Senior Support Consultant*****Reporting Structure****Reports to Project / Programme Manager/ UK Project Lead****Requisites*****Education:**B.E. or equivalent  
  
**Experience (years):** At least 4+ years of experience working in application support  
  
**Industry / Technology background:** Application implementation , Maintenance and Support (any domain).  
  
**Location:**Mumbai  
  
**Working Hours:**Full Time UK Hours  
  
**(Standard Rave] Pre-employment checks:**Required  
  
**Key Functions**Join our Customer Support Operations group and be part of a dynamic team responsible for resolving application support issues for our client solution. As a member of our team, you will provide technical assistance, application support, and guidance to NEC customers. You will also work towards meeting SLAs and ensuring customer satisfaction through effective communication and problem resolution.  
  
Main Responsibilities:  
  

* Provide technical assistance and application support to customers, demonstrating in-depth knowledge of application environments.
* Understand contractual commitments and resolve incidents/problems within contracted SLAs.
* Translate customer requirements into workarounds and solutions.
* Develop and implement technical support procedures/documentation.
* Proactively deliver support services and identify revenue generation opportunities.

Requirement is working UK hours , Monday to Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm on Rota basis .  
  
***Competencies* Essential:**

* Proven experience supporting Web Applications
* Proficiency in SQL scripting and database administration
* Experience of delivering support to users

**Technologies Hands-on Experience (Years) Priority**supporting Web Applications

**Desirable:**

* It is highly desirable for candidates to have experience with NEC software and related applications.
* Familiarity with administering operating systems e.g. Microsoft Windows/Linux/Solaris.
* Experience with application delivery tools like Citrix.
* Understanding of software development principles in an ISO 9001 environment.
* Experience creating reports using Business Objects or similar tools.

**Personal Skills & Attributes:**

* Communicate problems in a timely manner to the Tech Lead, Project Manager
* Ability to handle Pressure when required
* Establishes and maintains agreed standards applicable to the work undertaken and ensures that the team adheres to
* Is a good team player
* Ability to remain calm in adverse situation and act wisely
* Ability to communicate and collaborate effectively with team members located elsewhere within the UK and India
* Demonstrate an enthusiastic and pro-active approach to software development
* Demonstrate the desire to produce high quality software products within agreed budget and timescale constraints
* The ability to pro-actively suggest and implement process improvements that enhance the performance, productivity and morale of the team
* The ability to work flexibly and imaginatively in a changing and evolving project environment.

Job Title : IT Support Specialist  
  
Years of exp : 1-3 Years  
  
**Key Responsibilities**User & Group Management :  
  

* Manage users and groups in Microsoft 365 Entra ID and Google Workspace
* Handle access control, provisioning, and de-provisioning of accounts

**Networking & Security**

* Troubleshoot and manage routing, switching, firewalls, VPNs
* Perform packet analysis and resolve connectivity issues
* Collaborate with security tools like CrowdStrike or similar

**Scripting & Automation**

* Write and maintain basic scripts using Python, Bash, or PowerShell
* Automate routine tasks and support cybersecurity initiatives

**Communication**

* Clearly explain technical issues to non-technical users
* Prioritize and manage multiple support tickets effectively

(ref:hirist.tech)

Description

About Apna

Founded in 2019, Apna is India’s largest professional networking platform dedicated to helping India’s burgeoning working class to unlock unique professional networking, and skilling opportunities. We’re one of the fastest growing unicorns currently live in 60+ cities of 20+ states.

Backed by marquee investors like Tiger Global, Lightspeed, Sequoia, Owl Ventures, Greenoaks Capital & few more with solid $190+ funding. Apna is on a mission to enable livelihoods for billions in India. With over 16 million users from 50+ cities and 100,000+ employers that trust the platform - India has a new destination to discover relevant opportunities.

**About the Role:**

We’re looking for a skilled and service-oriented **EUC Engineer** to join our EUC team and provide support for end-user computing environments. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring smooth day-to-day IT operations by supporting end-user devices, resolving technical issues, and enhancing the overall user experience across a hybrid environment of macOS, Windows, and mobile platforms.

**Requirement:** 1

**Title:** EUC/IT-Support Engineer

**Department:** End-User Computing

**Location:** Bangalore (Work from Office - Indiranagar, Domlur)

**Experience Required:** 3-4 years

**Reports To:** EUC Lead

Requirements

**What is the scope & responsibility of the Role?**

* Support Appna’s IT Operations
* Address user tickets regarding hardware, software and networking
* Conduct remote troubleshooting
* Diagnose and resolve technical issues
* Installation and support end-user devices.
* Create technical documentation and SOP’s
* Installing authorised software and ensuring patches and upgrades are applied on end-user devices
* Build packages, and administrates Mac, Windows OS and IOS/Android devices through MDM
* Complies with all company policies and procedures.
* Participates in the implementation and support of IT-related policies.

**Skills/Strength of an Ideal Candidate**

* 3-4 years of relevant experience in IT support or similar roles (Technical Support Engineer, Desktop Support Engineer, IT Help Desk Technician).
* Hands-on experience with Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.
* Good knowledge of Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Slack, Jira, and other productivity/collaboration tools.
* Experience with MDM platforms such as Jamf, Intune, Kandji, WS-1 etc.
* Good understanding of network fundamentals including DHCP, DNS, office Wi-Fi, and VPN troubleshooting.
* Familiarity with IT ticketing systems and asset management tools.
* Proficient in diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, and Network connectivity issues.
* Good communication skills with a positive and professional attitude.
* Experience in AV/VC setup and support (e.g., Zoom, Google Meet, Polycom)
* Strong troubleshooting and critical thinking skills
* Ability to perform remote troubleshooting and provide clear instructions.
* Responsible for managing assets, inventory details, regular update of all assets tractions and sharing MIS reports on a regular basis

Direct message the job poster from Atyeti Inc

[Rosy Smita](https://in.linkedin.com/in/rosy-smita-18785243)
![Click here to view Rosy Smita’s profile]()

### Rosy Smita

#### Talent Acquisition Lead at Atyeti Inc

**Job Description:**

We're looking for an experienced L3 Application Support Engineer to join our team. As an L3 engineer, you'll be responsible for addressing complex technical issues, collaborating with development teams, and ensuring system stability and reliability. Your expertise will be crucial in providing top-level support for our software applications and integrations.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* Minimum 6+ years of experience in Product support or Application support.
* Experience in Investment banking domain .
* Location: Bangalore (RMZ Eco world) , Hybrid -4 days in a week from office

We're looking for an experienced L3 Application Support Engineer to join our team. As an L3 engineer, you'll be responsible for addressing complex technical issues, collaborating with development teams, and ensuring system stability and reliability. Your expertise will be crucial in providing top-level support for our software applications and integrations.

* Experience in handling escalations from L2 support teams, perform root cause analysis, and provide permanent fixes for recurring issues.
* Experience with strong SQL , Unix scripting, debugging hands on.
* Hands on with debugging the stored procedure , writing queries.
* Good with Unix troubleshooting , at times server level basic troubleshooting.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to resolve complex issues.
* Good experience on job scheduling tools – Control M/Autosys.
* Networking commands
* Excellent Communication
* Work closely with development teams, DB teams, and performance engineering teams to provide permanent fixes and optimize solutions.

Direct message the job poster from Sikich India

[Yuva Kirithika Thangavel](https://in.linkedin.com/in/yuva-kirithika-thangavel-19278526a)
![Click here to view Yuva Kirithika Thangavel’s profile]()

### Yuva Kirithika Thangavel

#### Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist @ Sikich

Sikich is seeking a **IT Support Engineer** -**NOC Analyst (NOC Level 1)** within our Managed Services team to play a crucial role in supporting the monitoring, analysis, and resolution of network and system incidents for our diverse client base. As a Junior NOC Analyst, you will contribute to the smooth operation of our managed services offerings by assisting in incident response, providing infrastructure support, and ensuring effective system monitoring.

**About the firm**

Sikich is a global company specializing in Accounting, Advisory, and Technical professional services. With employees across the globe, Sikich ranks as one of the largest professional services companies in the United States. Our comprehensive skillsets, obtained over decades of experience as entrepreneurs, business owners and industry innovators, allow us to provide insights and transformative strategies to help strengthen every dimension of our clients businesses.

**Primary Job Responsibilities Client-Focused Incident Management:**

* Serve as the initial point of contact for monitoring network and system alerts across multiple client environments.
* Assist in the identification and resolution of basic network and system incidents, escalating more complex issues to senior team members as needed.
* Collaborate with internal teams to ensure timely and effective resolution of incidents, minimizing service impact.
* Use available tools and resources to diagnose and provide clear recommendations for basic technical issues.
* Track and document incidents to identify patterns or recurring issues, contributing to ongoing improvements.

**Support and Monitoring:**

* Proactively monitor client systems for potential issues, responding to alerts and preventing downtime and disruptions.
* Utilize screen sharing and remote-control tools to assist clients with technical issues and gather information for escalation.
* Create and maintain detailed records of client interactions, issues, and resolutions in the ticketing system.

**Skill Development:**

* Seek guidance and mentorship from senior NOC analysts to develop your technical skills and understanding of infrastructure support.
* Participate in knowledge-sharing sessions to enhance your skills and understanding of client-specific environments.

**Client Documentation and Communication:**

* Maintain accurate documentation of incident response procedures and best practices tailored to each client's environment.
* Provide clear and timely updates to clients regarding the status of their issues, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction.

**Policies and Procedures:**

* Adhere to company policies, procedures, and service level agreements (SLAs) in delivering IT support.
* Follow established guidelines and best practices to ensure quality and consistency in support.

**After-Hours Support:**

* Participate in after-hours on-call rotation as required to support client needs outside of regular business hours.

**Requirements**

* 1+ years of experience troubleshooting infrastructure systems, with a preference for experience in Managed Services environments.
* Familiarity with PSA & RMM toolsets such as ConnectWise Manage, LabTech/ConnectWise Automate and LogicMonitor is a plus.
* Basic experience with computers, network, storage, and backup systems, with an emphasis on foundational knowledge in these areas.
* Experience in support and administration of Office 365, Azure, and Microsoft Cloud services, with additional experience in CSP (Cloud Solution Provider) environments being a plus.
* Strong troubleshooting skills for handling day-to-day technical requests and issues.
* Certifications from Microsoft, particularly those related to Azure, are ideal. Certifications from other vendors such as HP, Cisco, or similar are also beneficial.

**Benefits of being a part of the team**

* Family Health Insurance including parents
* Life & Accident Insurance
* Maternity/paternity leave
* Performance-based incentives
* Referral Bonus program
* Exam Fee Reimbursement Policy
* Indian festival holidays
* 5 days working week
* Doctor's Consultation

**Business Development Executive (BDE) – Outbound Prospecting & Lead Generation**

**Company:** Teceze

**Department:** Sales & Business Development

**Location:** Onsite

**Reporting To:** Business Development Manager / Head of Sales

**Role Summary**

Teceze is looking for a **Business Development Executive (BDE)** to drive new business growth through **outbound prospecting, cold calling, and lead generation**. The primary objective of this role is to identify and engage potential customers, qualify opportunities, and **schedule Microsoft Teams meetings** for the senior sales team.

This role is ideal for someone who is energetic, target-driven, and comfortable speaking to decision-makers in IT, procurement, and business leadership.

**Key Responsibilities**

1. Outbound Prospecting & Lead Generation

* Conduct **daily outbound calls** to prospects across assigned regions and segments.
* Run structured outreach campaigns using **cold calls, emails, and LinkedIn**.
* Research target accounts, identify key stakeholders (CIO, IT Director, Procurement, HR, etc.), and build high-quality prospect lists.
* Qualify leads based on agreed criteria (budget, need, authority, timeline, fit).

2. Meeting Scheduling (Microsoft Teams)

* **Schedule Microsoft Teams meetings** for senior sales leaders / solution consultants with qualified prospects.
* Manage and coordinate calendars, send invites, and ensure all relevant details (agenda, participants, context) are captured.
* Follow up with prospects to confirm attendance and reschedule if required.

3. Pipeline Management & CRM Hygiene

* Log all interactions (calls, emails, LinkedIn touches, meetings) in the CRM accurately and in a timely manner.
* Maintain an up-to-date pipeline of leads and opportunities with clear next steps.
* Prepare basic reports on activity (calls made, meetings booked, leads generated, conversions, etc.).

4. Collaboration with Sales & Marketing

* Work closely with the **sales team** to understand target industries, service offerings, and ideal customer profiles.
* Coordinate with **marketing** on campaigns, follow-up lists, and messaging.
* Share feedback from the market (objections, competitor insights, customer needs) to refine pitches and campaigns.

5. Sales Support & Follow-Up

* Send follow-up emails after initial conversations and meetings (recaps, next steps, sharing decks, etc.).
* Support the sales team with basic information gathering, prospect intel, and contact validation.
* Nurture early-stage leads until they are ready to be handed over as qualified opportunities.

**Key Metrics (KPIs)**

* Number of **outbound calls** made per day / week.
* Number of **Teams meetings scheduled** with qualified prospects.
* Conversion rate from **contact → meeting → qualified lead**.
* Volume and quality of **new leads added** to the pipeline.
* CRM accuracy and data quality.

**Required Skills & Experience**

* **1–3 years** of experience in Business Development / Inside Sales / Tele-Sales (IT services or B2B tech preferred).
* Strong **verbal communication skills** and confidence in making outbound calls.
* Good **written communication skills** for emails and LinkedIn messaging.
* Familiarity with **Microsoft Teams**, CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot, Zoho), and basic productivity tools (Excel, PowerPoint).
* Ability to quickly understand and articulate Teceze’s services (IT support, FSO, Digital Workplace, Infra services, etc.).
* Target-driven mindset with resilience and the ability to handle rejection.
* Strong organization and time-management skills.

Apply
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-engineer-part-time-at-papertrue-4323459422&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-engineer-part-time-at-papertrue-4323459422&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**Designation:** IT Support Engineer  
  
**Type:** Freelance/Part-time  
  
**Location:** Aundh, Pune  
  
**Note:** This is a **freelance/part-time position** and not a full-time opportunity. Compensation will be provided on an **hourly basis**. Applicants **based in Pune are preferred**, as the role may occasionally require **in-person visits to the office**.  
  
**Roles And Responsibilities**

* Administer and manage Google Workspace (formerly G Suite), including user accounts, groups, organizational units, and permissions.
* Configure and maintain company-wide systems such as email, shared drives, and security settings within Google Workspace.
* Handle onboarding/offboarding processes including access provisioning and deactivation.
* Monitor and troubleshoot system performance, ensuring minimal downtime.
* Maintain IT hardware and software inventory, ensuring license compliance.
* Manage endpoint devices (laptops, desktops, printers, and network peripherals).
* Support network configuration, Wi-Fi setup, and VPN connectivity.
* Collaborate with third-party vendors (e.g., Google Support, AWS, hardware suppliers) for technical troubleshooting and service escalations.
* Implement and maintain data backup, recovery, and security protocols.
* Assist employees with technical issues and provide Level 1 and 2 IT support when needed.
* Maintain documentation for IT processes, configurations, and troubleshooting guides

**Required Skills & Qualifications**

* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
* 2–4 years of experience in system administration or IT infrastructure management.
* Hands-on experience with Google Workspace administration (mandatory).
* Knowledge of user lifecycle management, group policies, and Google Admin Console.
* Familiarity with Windows, macOS, and Linux operating systems.

Skills: google workspace,it help desk,it asset management

**Head of Technical Support -**As the G1 Head of Technical Support, you will be the central force ensuring an exceptional post-go-live technical experience across the Ginesys One suite. You’ll oversee L3 support operations across all products, manage customer escalations, drive cross-team resolution, and build processes for  
  
visibility, accountability, and continuous improvement. This is a cross-functional, high-impact leadership role, working across engineering, QA, DevOps,  
  
customer support, and product teams to ensure that every issue is tracked, resolved, and learned from—within SLA and with a customer-first mindset.  
  
**You Will****Incident & Ticket Management**

* Own end-to-end L3 technical support governance across Ginesys One products (ERP, POS,OMS, etc.)
* Ensure customer issues are responded to and resolved within defined SLAs
* Drive prioritization, root cause resolution, and engineering coordination across product teams
* Personally manage and de-escalate high-severity issues with customers and internal teams

**Process & Metrics Ownership**

* Define, track, and optimize support processes, SLAs, escalation workflows, and ticket lifecycle practices
* Build dashboards for SLA adherence, issue aging, bug trends, defect density, etc.
* Establish strong feedback loops to engineering/product based on recurring issues

**RCA & Knowledge Management**

* Ensure timely Root Cause Analysis (RCAs) for all S1/S2 issues with actionable insights
* Lead trend analysis to preempt issues and recommend long-term fixes or product hardening
* Build and maintain a knowledge base to improve internal resolution efficiency

**Customer Interaction**

* Engage with enterprise customers on complex or long-running tickets
* Serve as a trusted escalation point for strategic clients
* Collaborate with Customer Success and Implementation teams for seamless client experience

**Collaboration & Leadership**

* Coordinate with Product Architects and Engineering Heads to ensure ticket resolution
* Build and mentor a lean L3 support team or tiger squads when required
* Drive a culture of accountability, learning, and proactiveness in technical support

**Essential Requirements**

* 12+ years of experience in technical support or L3 support leadership roles in SaaS or high- scale enterprise products
* Strong experience handling customer escalations, RCAs, and cross-team ticket resolution
* Solid technical background (understanding of APIs, microservices, database queries, logs, debugging)
* Expertise in support tooling: Freshdesk, Jira, ServiceNow, etc.
* Excellent communication skills—able to speak fluently with both customers and engineers
* Data-driven mindset for reporting, insights, and stakeholder updates
* Experience working in retail tech, ERP, or platform businesses is a big plus

**Why This Role Is Exciting**

* You’ll be at the heart of the customer experience for thousands of retail users
* Opportunity to design the technical support function from the ground up across multiple modern SaaS products
* High visibility role with direct impact on customer retention, product quality, and engineering focus
* Work in a collaborative leadership team and influence architecture, product design, and QA indirectly through insights

**Take this first step towards your dream career and an insane learning path.**Every Ginesys team member brings something unique to the table.  
  
**Benefits**We like to think that talent grows at Ginesys One and stays at Ginesys. To ensure this, we provide our employees with the best working environment, the latest technology and continuous support. We go out of our way to retain the small business feeling with which we started and stimulate innovation and collaboration through teamwork and our non-hierarchical approach. We offer competitive salary, and other fantastic perks and benefits, such as:  
  
Ginesys Academy for holistic training and development.  
  

* Comprehensive health insurance coverage.
* Excellent rewards and recognition policy.
* Transparent compensation policy with no unnecessary deduction in CTC.
* Annual company off-site and a variety of events, celebrations throughout the year.
* Travelling opportunities between our offices across the country.
* Annual Ginesys walkathon & related sporting events.
* Quarterly Coffee with CEO.

**Here’s our story; now tell us yours:**“Ginesys One” is India’s best omni retail suite backed by Ginesys, the first integrated Retail specific ERP software for online retail, offline retail and distribution. It is the largest Indian company in the retail tech industry catering to both online and offline needs. 1200 + brands including (Manyavar, V-Mart, Skechers) are accelerating their businesses with Ginesys. With a team of 400+ employees, Ginesys One plans to revolutionize retail by being a single-stop cloud-based retail suite.  
  
We have a pan India presence with offices in major cities including Gurgaon, Kolkata, Bangalore, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Coimbatore & Goa and are expanding rapidly. We love the challenges of retail and are busy solving them to create a great retail tech suite.  
  
Ginesys core mission is to continue to build world-class internal service capabilities, in a bid to deliver outstanding external service value to customers. We are an ISO-certified and SOC compliant company having won myriad awards for our innovation and support. For further information, please visit our website http://ginesys.in

**We are ready to try something new. Are you?**Syntegon is a global leader in process and packaging technology. With around 5,800 colleagues in nearly 20 countries, the Syntegon Group works on intelligent and sustainable technologies for the pharmaceutical and food industries. Let's contribute together to ensuring that people worldwide are provided with high-quality medications and safely packaged food.  
  
With our global service organization and our comprehensive service portfolio, we contribute sustainably to the profitable growth of our customers. Together, let's help ensure that people around the world are supplied with high-quality medicines and safely packaged foods.  
  
**Take** **the** **first** **step****!** **Apply** **now****!****Your duties**

* You provide support and hotline Services for all Engineering Applications in the mCAD Team of Syntegon. (During the Timezone of Asia Pacific)

(Examples of Engineering Applications in this field: SolidWorks, AutoDesk, DBWorks, CADBAS, CimDB etc.)  
  

* You have a DevOps (Technical) Responsibility for small and medium sized applications in mCAD
* You participate in and support projects related to our applications and tools.
* You advise our internal customer area on projects and change requests and manage the implementation in close collaboration with internal/external partners and service providers.
* You independently create IT concepts within one or a few IT systems.

+ You are responsible for the further development (or enhancement) and operation of our applications as a product specialist.

**Your profile**

* Graduation/ BE – Computer Science / Information Systems Yor a comparable field. .
* You have 4 - 6 years of experience in consulting and operations of engineering applications.
* You have good process and implementation knowledge in the field of engineering applications you specifically support, as well as initial experience with cross-application influences.
* Confidence in appearance, teamwork, flexibility, and assertiveness are a given for you.
* You complete your tasks proactively and independently.
* You also bring a basic willingness to travel.
* Onsite work in the office is required.
* Very good English skills, German is beneficial.

**More information**We are a group of open-minded and high-spirited collaborators. We emphasize collaboration and mutual support. We are more than happy to support your wishes of improvement within your area of expertise. Besides that, we offer a fine salary package, health insurance and various fun social activities.  
  
**Syntegon offer:**

* An attractive job in an international company
* A corporate culture with a strong focus on technology and collaboration
* Great opportunities for personal and professional development
* Informal work environment and committed colleagues
* An attractive salary package, pension and health insurance.

**Do you want more information?**Should you have questions regarding the above position, you are more than welcome to contact

**Job Title:** IT Support Engineer  
  
**Location:** Chennai  
  
**Department:** IT & Technical Support  
  
**Experience Required:** 4–7 years in IT Support / System & Network Troubleshooting  
  
**Job Summary**We are hiring an IT Support Engineer responsible for handling system installations, troubleshooting hardware/software issues, providing L1/L2 technical support, and ensuring smooth IT operations across the organization. The role requires strong technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and consistency in IT maintenance.  
  
**Key Responsibilities**Install, configure, and maintain hardware, software, and network equipment.  
  
Provide L1/L2 technical assistance to employees and resolve issues promptly.  
  
Diagnose system, network, and application problems.  
  
Manage user accounts, security updates, and data backups.  
  
Monitor system performance and ensure minimal downtime.  
  
Coordinate with vendors for hardware repairs or replacements.  
  
Maintain documentation of IT inventory, configurations, and support logs.  
  
**Required Skills And Qualifications**Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field.  
  
4–7 years of hands-on IT support experience.  
  
Strong knowledge of Windows/Linux OS, networks, and troubleshooting.  
  
Familiarity with system configuration, antivirus/security tools, and IT protocols.  
  
Good communication and problem-solving abilities.  
  
**Preferred Skills (Good To Have)**Experience in server maintenance and cloud support.  
  
Certifications like CCNA, A+, MCSA, or related technologies is a plus.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Lead System Integration Testing (SIT) for new implementations and system changes.
* Collaborate on technical infrastructure requirements for new projects.
* Manage and support UAT and Production environments, including deployments, patching, and issue resolution.
* Co-ordination with cross functional team business, product, software vendors, ISG, VAPT, Network, Firewall Security, Operations.
* Handle artifacts (Patch) deployments and ensure smooth rollouts across all environments.
* Understand and support end-to-end trading application flows, including integration with other enterprise systems.

**Required Skills & Knowledge**

* Strong experience in Linux, Windows, SQL, Mongo DB, Oracle system administration.
* Basic understanding of networking concepts and firewall devices, ITIL Process management.
* Hands-on experience with application deployment, UAT and Production environment setup, and monitoring tools.
* Good understanding of trading domain workflows; prior exposure to broking or exchange environments is preferred.
* Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and communication skills.

**Preferred Qualifications**

* B.E or B.Tech.
* Experience working in financial services, especially in trading platforms.
* Familiarity with DevOps practices and automation tools is a plus.

**Location :** Mumbai  
  
**Experience :** 8-12 years  
  
(ref:hirist.tech)

BMC Helix Support / Technical Support Analyst-Remote
====================================================



#### [Müller's Solutions](https://sa.linkedin.com/company/muller-s-solutions?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Delhi, India 1 month ago Be among the first 25 applicants [See who Müller's Solutions has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D99935376%26title%3DTechnical%2BSupport%2BAnalyst&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

Apply
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fbmc-helix-support-technical-support-analyst-remote-at-m%25C3%25BCller-s-solutions-4333509502&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fbmc-helix-support-technical-support-analyst-remote-at-m%25C3%25BCller-s-solutions-4333509502&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

Müller's Solutions is seeking a dedicated Helix Support / Technical Support Analyst to join our remote team. In this role, you will provide exceptional technical support for Helix environments, assisting clients in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to version control, software deployments, and integration processes. You will collaborate with both customers and internal teams to ensure that Helix is used efficiently and effectively, while also contributing to ongoing improvements in our support processes.  
  
**Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide first-level technical support for Helix users, addressing inquiries and resolving issues in a timely manner
* Troubleshoot and diagnose problems related to Helix Core, including configuration, integration, and performance issues
* Assist in the onboarding and training of clients on Helix functionalities and best practices
* Document technical issues and solutions in detail to create a knowledge base for internal and customer use
* Collaborate with development and DevOps teams to understand client needs and implement effective solutions
* Stay current on Helix product updates and enhancements, effectively communicating changes to clients
* Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to refine support processes and tools

**Requirements****Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
* 2-4 years of experience in technical support, preferably in a software or version control environment
* Strong knowledge of Helix Core and experience with version control systems
* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical users
* Experience with scripting or automation tools to support troubleshooting efforts is a plus
* Strong communication skills and ability to work well in a remote team environment
* Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to providing exceptional support

**Preferred Qualifications:**

* Experience with CI/CD processes and tools
* Familiarity with other version control systems (e.g., Git, SVN) and software development methodologies
* Previous experience in a remote support role or IT service management
* Relevant certifications in IT support or Helix administration are advantageous
* Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively in a fast-paced environment

**Benefits**Why Join Us:  
  
Opportunity to work with a talented and passionate team.  
  
Competitive salary and benefits package.  
  
Exciting projects and innovative work environment.

IT Support Engineer
===================



#### [SaaS Labs](https://www.linkedin.com/company/saas-labs?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India 1 month ago Over 200 applicants [See who SaaS Labs has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D10436435%26title%3DInformation%2BTechnology%2BSupport%2BEngineer&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

[Apply](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?source=jobs_registration&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-engineer-at-saas-labs-4333156258)
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-engineer-at-saas-labs-4333156258&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fit-support-engineer-at-saas-labs-4333156258&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

Join SaaS Labs, where innovation meets excellence! SaaS Labs is a global SaaS company powering over 6000 businesses worldwide with its software ecosystem focused on automation, productivity, and collaboration. Backed by leading investors such as Peak XV Partners, Base10 Partners, and Eight Roads, our portfolio includes JustCall, Helpwise, Dialworks, EasyCalendar, CallPage, Atolia, and CallRoot. The IT Support Engineer is responsible for providing comprehensive technical support and maintenance across various IT services, including access management, user onboarding and offboarding, application management, and infra & network management. The role requires strong technical skills, excellent problem-solving abilities, and a commitment to delivering exceptional customer service.  
  
**Responsibilities**

* Provide technical support and troubleshooting for desktop systems, applications, and network connectivity.
* Diagnose and resolve hardware, software, and network issues.
* Assist users with operating system, application, and hardware-related questions.
* Install, configure, and maintain desktop and laptop computers, peripherals, and mobile devices.
* Perform routine maintenance and updates on hardware and software systems.
* Manage and troubleshoot issues with various operating systems, including macOS and Linux.
* Support and troubleshoot network-related issues, including LAN, WAN, and VPN connectivity.
* Configure and manage network devices such as routers, switches, and wireless access points.
* Ensure network security and monitor network performance.
* Provide user training on software applications and best practices for system use.
* Create and maintain detailed documentation of support processes, technical issues, and solutions.
* Develop user guides and technical documentation.
* Manage inventory of IT assets, including hardware and software licenses.
* Ensure proper tracking and documentation of IT assets.
* Coordinate with vendors for procurement and repair of IT equipment.
* Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of IT assets.
* Implement and maintain security protocols to protect data and systems.
* Ensure compliance with organizational policies and procedures.
* Assist with security audits and vulnerability assessments.
* Ability to fully assist in SOC/ISO/HIPAA/Client audits from an IT controls perspective.
* Manage user accounts, permissions, and access controls in accordance with company policies.
* Configure and maintain identity and access management systems (e. g., JumpCloud, Google Workspace, Slack, etc).
* Ensure secure and compliant access to IT resources.
* Facilitate the IT onboarding process for new hires, including account creation, hardware setup, and software installation.
* Conduct IT orientation sessions for new employees.
* Manage the IT offboarding process, ensuring secure deactivation of accounts and retrieval of company assets.

**Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Proven experience as an IT Support Engineer or Desktop Support Engineer, or similar role.
* Experience with the latest technologies and tools in IT support.
* Experience with access management, user onboarding/offboarding, and application management.
* Proficiency in Mac OS, Windows, and Linux operating systems.
* Knowledge of GWS, Slack, Atlassian, and other productivity software.
* Experience with identity and access management systems (e. g., JumpCloud, JAMF, Active Directory, LDAP).
* Familiarity with cloud technologies and services (e. g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud).
* Understanding of network fundamentals and troubleshooting.
* Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
* Customer-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality support.
* Hardware & Networking, CompTIA A+, Network+, or Security+.
* ITIL Foundation Certification.
* CCNA, CCNP, MCSE, MCSA.
* Experience with automation tools and scripting (e. g., PowerShell, Bash).
* Familiarity with ITSM tools (e. g., ServiceNow, Jira Service Desk).
* Knowledge of endpoint management solutions (e. g., MDM, SCCM, Intune).

This job was posted by Ashitha Shetty from SaaS Labs.

**Job Purpose**The Chief Technology Officer should be a high-level executive responsible for managing the daily operations of the company. This person must have a deep understanding of technology, process improvement, and a strong sense of leadership. Additionally, they should be capable of redesigning processes to optimize the efficiency and effectiveness of the organization.  
  
**Job Responsibilities**

* Define, implement and review IT operational policies.
* Develop and execute new growth and process improvement directives.
* Collaborate with other departments to create processes and policies from IT for optimal project delivery.
* Communicate with department heads to develop projects and ensure compliance across the company.
* Oversee customer projects, follow up and ensure compliance and completion of each project.
* Oversee the internal and external customer service provided by the team in charge.
* Coordinate with superiors to make decisions on operational activities and set strategic objectives.
* Plan and supervise the daily operation of your area and team to ensure its smooth running.
* Identify opportunities for improvement, redesign of processes and equipment for the best performance of the area's tasks.
* Periodically evaluate the effectiveness of business procedures in accordance with organizational objectives and implement improvements.
* Manage relationships/agreements with customer partners/suppliers and other stakeholders.
* Focus on process improvement and ensure project compliance.
* Provide strong leadership and follow up to teams.
* Ensure your team has a good knowledge of technology language, up to date with required certifications and customer service.

**Job Requirements**

* Bachelor's degree in IT or any related field.
* At least 10 years of experience in Operations, preferably in managed service provider (MSP) industry.
* Excellent English communication skills (both written and verbal).
* Proven skills in translating insights into strategies and action plans.
* Super analytical and resourceful.
* Excellent attention to detail and problem-solving skills.
* Good leadership and coaching skills.
* Experience in process improvement.
* Focus on project compliance and task execution review.
* High degree of leadership and team follow-up.
* Knowledge of technological language.
* Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) Certification is an advantage.
* Open to work in EST time zone.
* Open for a hybrid set-up.
* Teams in charge
* IT (Service desk, network, general IT support)
* Projects
* Development

(ref:hirist.tech)

**Responsibilities**

* Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to desktops, laptops, and printers.
* Install and configure desktop, laptop, and printer hardware.
* Generate and maintain monthly IT support activity reports.
* Provide basic support for Microsoft 365 applications.
* Install and configure office automation tools.
* Assist in antivirus and endpoint security management.
* Maintain an organized and disciplined work environment.
* Communicate effectively with end-users and internal teams.

**Requirements**

* Experience: Minimum 2 years.
* Education: Any Graduate.
* Strong troubleshooting and installation skills for IT hardware (Desktops, Laptops, Printers, Scanners).
* Basic understanding of Microsoft 365 and SharePoint.
* Experience with antivirus tools and endpoint security solutions.
* Exposure to Servers, Firewalls, Switches, and Routers.
* Excellent communication skills with a professional attitude.
* Willingness to travel across client sites when needed.

This job was posted by Jyotsna Khairmode from Logic Systech.

System Administrator - IT Support
=================================



#### [Blue Matter](https://www.linkedin.com/company/blue-matter?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Pune/Pimpri-Chinchwad Area 1 month ago Over 200 applicants [See who Blue Matter has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D3273849%26title%3DSystem%2BAdministrator&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

Apply
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fsystem-administrator-it-support-at-blue-matter-4332831528&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fsystem-administrator-it-support-at-blue-matter-4332831528&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**About Blue Matter**Blue Matter is a strategic consulting firm serving the life sciences industry, bringing  
  
original ideas and a meaningful impact to clients across pharma and biotech. Founded  
  
in 2012, we operate globally with teams across North America, Europe, and India.  
  
Role Overview  
  
We’re seeking a hands-on System Administrator to support and mature Blue Matter’s IT  
  
environment India. You’ll administer both Google Workspace and  
  
Microsoft 365, manage cloud and endpoint services, and troubleshoot hardware for a  
  
mixed Windows/macOS fleet. This role partners closely with Security and Enterprise  
  
Applications to deliver a reliable, secure, and user-friendly technology experience.  
  
Location: Pune or Gurgaon, India (Onsite)  
  
Team: IT & Security  
  
What You’ll Do  
  
Google Workspace administration: User / group / OU management; security, Gmail,  
  
Drive/Shared Drives, Calendar, and device policies in the Admin Console; identity and  
  
SSO integrations where applicable.  
  
Microsoft 365 & Azure AD (Entra ID): User / license management; Exchange Online,  
  
SharePoint, OneDrive; Azure AD conditional access; basic PowerShell for automation.  
  
Endpoint & mobility: Intune / Endpoint Manager (and/or equivalent MDM) for Windows  
  
and macOS; software packaging, update rings, device compliance, disk encryption.  
  
Hardware support: Diagnose and resolve laptop, dock, display, printer, and peripheral  
  
issues; coordinate vendor repairs and RMA; maintain spares and asset inventory.  
  
Network fundamentals: Support office Wi-Fi/LAN (basic switch/AP troubleshooting),  
  
VPN client configuration, and DNS/DHCP basics (escalate to network partners as  
  
needed).  
  
Cloud & SaaS administration: Provision and support core SaaS (e.g., collaboration,  
  
project tools); manage SSO, MFA, and least-privilege access; assist with backups and  
  
retention.  
  
Security & compliance: Implement hardening baselines, patching, and endpoint  
  
protection; respond to alerts; support audits and evidence collection alongside Security.  
  
Automation & documentation: Build light automations (PowerShell, bash, Google Apps  
  
Script) and maintain playbooks, diagrams, and KB articles for repeatable operations.  
  
Customer service: Provide timely L1/L2 support, including new-hire onboarding, desk  
  
setups, and executive support; maintain high CSAT.  
  
What You’ll Bring  
  
Experience: 3–6 years in IT systems administration supporting both Google Workspace  
  
and Microsoft 365 in a multi-site environment.  
  
Technical depth:  
  
Google Admin Console (users/groups/OU, security, Drive, Gmail, devices).  
  
Microsoft 365 + Azure AD/Entra (Exchange Online, SharePoint/OneDrive, Conditional  
  
Access, basic PowerShell).  
  
Intune/Endpoint Manager (Windows/macOS), JAMF or equivalent MDM a plus.  
  
Solid hardware troubleshooting for laptops/peripherals; imaging/provisioning  
  
experience.  
  
Core networking (TCP/IP, VLANs, VPN, Wi-Fi) fundamentals.  
  
Security mindset: MFA, SSO, least-privilege, patching, disk encryption, EDR/antivirus;  
  
familiarity with incident response workflows.  
  
Soft skills: Clear communication, service orientation, and the ability to work  
  
independently onsite while collaborating with global colleagues.  
  
Nice-to-haves / Certifications: CompTIA A+ / Network+ / Security+, Microsoft Certified:  
  
Azure Administrator Associate, Google Workspace Administrator, ITIL Foundation.  
  
Why Blue Matter  
  
Work with a mission-driven consulting firm at the intersection of life sciences and  
  
strategy, recognized for impactful client work and a people-first culture. Blue Matter  
  
Consulting+2Blue Matter Consulting+2  
  
Join a growing India presence—including in Pune—aligned with our global teams and  
  
recent expansion of analytics and insights capabilities. Blue Matter Consulting  
  
Logistics  
  
Work arrangement: Onsite, Pune office (with occasional off-hours support for global  
  
incidents/maintenance windows).  
  
Employment type: Full-time.  
  
Equipment: Company-issued laptop and necessary peripherals provided.

We are looking for a versatile and hands-on IT Support Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will be the primary point of contact for all employee IT needs, providing comprehensive support for our hardware, software, and network infrastructure.  
  
The ideal candidate has a strong technical foundation in both hardware troubleshooting and software support, with a customer-centric approach to problem-solving. You will be responsible for maintaining our systems, resolving support tickets, and ensuring our technology runs smoothly to support our business goals.  
  
Key Responsibilities  
  

* Hardware Management & Support
* Install, configure, and maintain company desktops, laptops, printers, scanners, and other peripherals.
* Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve hardware issues in a timely manner (e.g., component replacement, repairs).
* Manage the IT hardware lifecycle, including procurement, inventory tracking, and secure disposal of old equipment.
* Set up and support mobile devices (smartphones, tablets) and ensure they are compliant with company security policies.
* Software & Application Support
* Install, configure, and update operating systems (Windows, macOS, etc.) and all standard office software (e.g., MS Office 365, etc.).
* Provide support for business-specific applications (e.g., ERP, CRM, accounting software, HR Software, etc.), acting as the first line of defense before escalating to the vendor.
* Manage software licensing, ensuring compliance and optimal use.
* Troubleshoot and resolve software conflicts, performance issues, and user errors.
* User & Helpdesk Support
* Act as the primary point of contact for all IT support requests via helpdesk tickets, email, phone, or in person.
* Log all issues and resolutions in the IT helpdesk system.
* Prioritize and manage multiple open tickets simultaneously.
* Provide friendly and effective technical assistance and training to end-users.
* Network & Systems Administration
* Assist in managing user accounts and permissions in Active Directory (e.g., creating new users, password resets).
* Provide basic network support, including troubleshooting connectivity issues (Wi-Fi, LAN, VPN).
* Monitor system performance and uptime, performing routine maintenance.
* Ensure data backup procedures are running correctly and assist with data recovery operations.

**Qualifications & Skills**Must-Haves:  
  

* Experience: 2-5 years of hands-on experience in an IT support role.
* Education: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
* Hardware Skills: Strong diagnostic and troubleshooting skills for PCs, laptops, and printers.
* Software Skills: High proficiency in Windows 10/11, Microsoft Office 365, and common antivirus/security software.
* Admin Skills: Experience with Active Directory and managing email accounts (e.g., Exchange, Google Workspace).
* Networking Skills: Good understanding of basic networking concepts (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN).
* Soft Skills:

+ Excellent communication and customer service skills.
+ Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
+ Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.
+ Patient and approachable demeanor.

Nice-to-Haves:  
  

* Relevant IT certifications (e.g., CompTIA A+, Network+, Microsoft 365 Certified).
* Experience supporting macOS environments.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (Azure, AWS).
* Experience with virtualization technologies (VMware, Hyper-V).
* Basic understanding of IT security principles.
* High proficiency in Widows 10/11, Microsoft Office 365, Linux OS (Ubuntu), dual boot, and common antivirus security software.

**JOB ROLE**

* Be responsible for production support & release management for application assigned
* Ensure the builds are ring-fenced with right approvals and tests before production movement, conduct pre-production testing
* Should possess excellent troubleshooting and analytical skills.

**Key Responsibilities**

* Develop, manage, measure and report on key service-level metrics
* Strive for continuous improvement of incident management process and integration with other IT operations management processes
* Build and maintain relationships with all IT units to ensure that IT-delivered services and end-user productivity goals are understood and exceeded
* Perform collaboration sessions and develop action plans to address the knowledge transfer from the application development team for new releases
* Conduct trend analyses and action plans for improving service timeliness and reducing costs
* Contribute to problem solutioning, change, release, knowledge and ensure BCP/DR activities are planned and conducted
* Track resolution of all open issues, be part of the solutioning team for war room / discussions
* Manage audit queries related to Production environment

**Mandatory Skills Required**

* Must have worked as production support
* Must have handled customer facing application, mobile application, finance application.
* Well versed with Sharp troubleshooting tool.
* Have strong knowledge of application stack.
* Have strong lending/digital lending experience in support.
* Have deep knowledge of oracle/SQL and server-side technology/architecture
* Have thorough understanding of networking concepts, firewalls, Clustering
* Must have done RBI Audits & compliance handling.
* Must have done POs and Agreements.

**Key Activities Are To**

* Provide remote product support, inclusive of technical mentoring, problem troubleshooting, and the provision of solution based on configuration parameter change or workarounds for product defects/limitations.
* Provide production support on issues faced during day to day operations and running of system real time & batch interfaces.
* Should have excellent customer facing & communication skill, both written and verbal.
* Ability to handle customer expectation for issues received over email or verbally.
* Need to update customer verbally or via email on the progress made towards resolution of an issue reported.

**Role**

* Technical & application support of a world class retail sales & inventory management system used by top telecommunications service providers in US, Europe & Asia.
* Provide diagnostics & troubleshooting & solutions to product & production issues.
* Need to work in a global team located across the globe to provide product on SLA and to meet quality standards.
* Verbal and written communication with international customers.

(ref:hirist.tech)

Servicenow ITAM(HAM Analyst)
============================



#### [NuStar Technologies](https://www.linkedin.com/company/nustar-technologies-inc.?trk=public_jobs_topcard-org-name) Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India 2 months ago Be among the first 25 applicants [See who NuStar Technologies has hired for this role](https://www.linkedin.com/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D10800876%26title%3DTechnical%2BSupport%2BAnalyst&emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&trk=public_jobs_see-who-was-hired_people-search-link_face-pile-cta)

Apply
[Save](https://www.linkedin.com/login?emailAddress=&fromSignIn=&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fservicenow-itam-ham-analyst-at-nustar-technologies-4312593724&trk=public_jobs)

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fservicenow-itam-ham-analyst-at-nustar-technologies-4312593724&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**HAM Analyst**

* Configuration and maintenance of Hardware Asset Management Workspace for Operational Use
* Knowledge transfer to Hardware Asset Management Team on Hardware Asset Management Workspace for supporting day-to-day activities
* Ensure Correctness and Completeness of Asset related attributes being populated from Discovery as well as non-discoverable attributes
* Daily remediation of discrepancies and gaps reported through the ITAM Dashboards
* Hardware Model Management - Normalization of Hardware Models and population of Lifecycle data (EOL/EOS) from Content Library
* Alignment of Hardware Models and Service Catalog
* Establish and manage data Certification cycle for Product Owners to certify and attest to the EOL/EOS dates populated from the Content Library aligned to Hardware Models
* Identify and report on Hardware Product EOL/EOS dates with a focus on Products that have approaching EOL/EOS dates, Approved Exceptions & Remediation Activities in progress
* Enablement of Out of the Box Catalogs/Workflows for Lifecycle Management
* Population of Financial data for each of the defined Hardware
* Correctness and Completeness of Financial field population for all Hardware Models
* Tracking and reporting on financial costs associated with Hardware Assets
* Objectives:
* Mature knowledge and usage of Hardware Asset Management and HAM Pro Components leveraging ServiceNow native tooling capabilities
* Mature Operational Health of Hardware Asset Management (Completeness, Correctness, and Compliance)
* Improve Visibility and Insights of Hardware Asset Management Data
* Improve Correctness and Completeness Hardware Model Data
* Improve Data Consistency and Accuracy for Hardware Assets
* Mature End of Life and End of Support Management for Hardware Assets
* Provide Budgeting, Forecasting, and Cost Optimization through Financial Management of Hardware Assets

**Roles & Responsibilities**

* Administer and maintain Linux systems such as RedHat, CentOS, Debian, and Windows/Mac systems.
* Manage and support databases like MySQL and MariaDB.
* Handle local server management including storage, file sharing, performance monitoring, and backups.
* Manage on-premise and cloud-based Git servers.
* Oversee GoDaddy VPS management, including domains, DNS, hosting, and SSL certificates.
* Manage DNS records (A, CNAME, MX, TXT, SPF) and ensure their proper configuration.
* Administer WHM and cPanel servers including user accounts, emails, and domains.
* Perform Microsoft 365 administration tasks like user creation and license management.
* Manage and configure network devices such as firewalls (especially SOPHOS), switches, and routers.
* Perform regular system security tests and continuous monitoring for vulnerabilities.
* Create and manage system permissions, user accounts, and access controls.
* Troubleshoot and provide technical support to employees for hardware, software, and networking issues.
* Maintain and configure LAMP stack components (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP), cron jobs, and SSL installations.
* Handle protocol-based network services (DNS, HTTP, LDAP, SMTP, SNMP) efficiently.
* Perform system reboots and maintenance tasks across Linux, Windows, and Mac environments.
* Maintain solid knowledge of Microsoft Office packages and related IT services.
* Support basic cloud services and infrastructure as required.

**Qualifications & Skills**

* Proven hands-on experience with Linux distributions including RedHat, CentOS, Debian.
* Strong experience with MySQL and/or MariaDB database administration.
* Solid understanding of network protocols : DNS, HTTP, LDAP, SMTP, SNMP.
* Experience managing Windows and Mac systems alongside Linux environments.
* Working knowledge of LAMP stack, Apache server, cron jobs, and SSL installation.
* Familiarity with GoDaddy VPS, DNS management, WHM/cPanel server administration.
* Microsoft 365 administration experience including user and license management.
* Experience managing network devices such as firewalls (SOPHOS preferred), switches, and routers.
* Strong problem-solving skills and effective communication abilities.
* Basic knowledge of cloud services and infrastructure management.
* Certifications such as RHCT, RHCE, LPIC are a strong advantage.
* Good understanding of Microsoft Office and general IT support.
* Ability to multitask, prioritize, and work independently or within a team

(ref:hirist.tech)

SemperFI Solutions provided pay range
-------------------------------------

This range is provided by SemperFI Solutions. Your actual pay will be based on your skills and experience — talk with your recruiter to learn more.

### Base pay range

₹1,000,000.00/yr - ₹1,500,000.00/yr

* Should have experience in supporting the application and infrastructure 24x7.
* Should have good working knowledge on troubleshooting skills of Operating Systems (Linux/Windows)
* Good experience on Java/j2EE application supporting and AWS infra supporting.
* Ability to work with 3rd parties/FOPS and provide required instruction to troubleshoot and restore faults.
* Respond quickly and effectively to production issues, troubleshooting solutions, and taking responsibility for seeing those solutions through resolution.
* Identify root cause and corrective actions for highly complex availability, capacity, security, performance, and quality issues affecting the database.
* Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix operating systems.
* Good knowledge of scripting languages like Shell, Python.
* Good Knowledge of Databases like Mongo, My SQL, SQL Server.
* Respond to alerts and take corrective action to ensure the high availability of our production environments and participate in an after-hours on-call rotation.
* Experience/Knowledge of other cloud platforms (Azure, Google Cloud) is a plus
* Strong verbal and written communications skills are a must
* Must have production support experience as the requirement is 24X7X365 production support.

Skills:- Java, J2EE, Windows Azure, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Python and MySQL

Firebucks provided pay range
----------------------------

This range is provided by Firebucks. Your actual pay will be based on your skills and experience — talk with your recruiter to learn more.

### Base pay range

₹1,000,000.00/yr - ₹1,800,000.00/yr

**Responsibilities**

* Provide daily support with resolution of escalated tickets and act as liaison to business and technical leads to ensure issues are resolved in timely manner.
* Incident resolution and supporting production system deployments.
* Suggest fixes to complex issues by doing a thorough analysis of root cause and impact of the defect.
* Support and deliver within Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery pipelines.
* Prioritise workload, providing timely and accurate resolutions.
* Perform production support activities which involve assignment of issues and issue analysis and resolution within the specified SLAs.
* Understand linux. SSH to linux box, look for web logs etc
* Understand web apps to be able to troubleshoot issues

**Requirements**

* Good to have programming experience with Python.
* Java and JavaScript development experience would be an added advantage.
* You should not be afraid to do some development as well as Devops.
* Clear written and oral communication is a must.

Skills:- Production, Jenkins, Python, Linux/Unix, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Javascript and DevOps

INSTRUMENTATION AND CONTROL SOLUTIONS (ICS) is on the lookout for passionate and experienced professionals to join our team as IT Desktop Support for Bangalore locations in India!  
  
Locations: Bangalore  
  
Experience: 2-8 Years in Manufacturing IT / Plant IT/QC-IT ( Preferably in the Pharma Sector)  
  
Role - IT Desktop Support Role  
  
**What Were Looking For**Hands-on experience in MFG-IT, Plant-IT, QC-IT  
  
Knowledge of Pharma Guidelines, IT SOPs, and Pharma Compliance  
  
Familiarity with 21 CFR Part 11, GAMP5, CSV, Empower Software  
  
Skills in User Management, Backup Management, and System Inventory  
  
If you're ready to bring your expertise into a high-impact, regulated IT environment - we want to hear from you!

**Description**We are looking for a skilled IT Support (L2) to join SFJ Business Solutions, a leading E-Learning company based in Bengaluru. As an IT Support (L2), you will play a crucial role in providing technical assistance and support to our internal team and clients. Your expertise will be vital in ensuring the smooth operation of our IT systems and resolving any technical issues efficiently.  
  
You will be involved in a variety of projects related to troubleshooting hardware and software problems, installing and configuring computer systems, diagnosing network issues, and providing technical guidance to users. This role is essential in maintaining the overall productivity and functionality of our IT infrastructure.  
  
**Responsibilities**

* Provide technical support to end-users in person, via phone, or remote tools
* Install, configure, and troubleshoot hardware and software components
* Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to network connectivity
* Collaborate with the IT team to ensure smooth operation of all systems
* Document all technical procedures and user guides
* Manage user accounts and permissions
* Perform regular system updates and upgrades
* Ensure data security and backup procedures are in place

**Requirements**

* Associate degree in Information Technology or related field
* Proven experience as an IT Support specialist or similar role
* Strong knowledge of Windows and Mac OS environments
* Experience with troubleshooting hardware and software issues
* Excellent communication and customer service skills
* Ability to work well in a team environment
* Knowledge of network protocols and security
* Certifications such as CompTIA A+ or Microsoft Certified IT Professional (MCITP) are a plus

As an integral part of our IT team at Talent Worx, the **Application Support Specialist** will provide outstanding support and troubleshooting for our software applications. The ideal candidate will have a strong tech background and a passion for delivering exceptional user experiences to ensure smooth operations across the organization.  
  
**Requirements****Key Responsibilities:**

* Provide technical support and troubleshooting for application issues reported by end-users
* Collaborate with developers to diagnose and resolve application bugs and performance issues
* Manage user access and permissions for applications, ensuring compliance and security
* Develop and maintain application documentation and knowledge base articles for end-user assistance
* Train new users on application functionalities and best practices
* Assist in application deployment and updates, coordinating with relevant teams for a smooth transition

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of 3 years of experience in application support or related roles
* Strong understanding of application development processes and methodologies
* Proficient in troubleshooting technical issues and providing solutions in a timely manner
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to work collaboratively with users and technical teams
* Experience with ticketing systems and user support documentation

**Desirable Skills:**

* Familiarity with SQL and database management
* Experience in a SaaS environment
* Knowledge of ITIL frameworks

**Benefits**"Opportunity to collaborate directly with diverse clients, enhancing professional growth and building strong business relationships."

* [Report this job](/uas/login?fromSignIn=true&session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fin.linkedin.com%2Fjobs%2Fview%2Fservicenow-tester-at-recruittalent-llc-4280146748&trk=public_jobs_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=JOB&_f=guest-reporting)

**Total Experience- 4+ years****Detailed JD****Relevant experience- 3 years**

* Testing and Quality Assurance: Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts for ServiceNow ITSM modules, such as Incident, Problem, Change, Request, and CMDB.
* Defect Identification and Tracking: Identify, document, and track defects using test management tools like JIRA or HP ALM.
* Validation and Verification: Validate workflows, business rules, and UI policies to ensure alignment with requirements.
* Collaboration and Troubleshooting: Collaborate with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders to troubleshoot and resolve issues.
* Automated Testing: Leverage automated testing tools like ServiceNow's Automated Test Framework (ATF) or Selenium for test execution .

**Mandatory Skills****ServiceNow Knowledge:** Strong understanding of ITSM processes and workflows, as well as experience with ServiceNow modules.  
  
**Testing Skills:** Experience with test automation using ATF, Selenium, or other tools.  
  
**Analytical and Problem-Solving Skills:** Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to evaluate constraints, risks, and dependencies.  
  
**Communication Skills:** Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  
  
**Certifications: CSA, ITIL****Desired Skills**

* Agile Methodologies: Experience with Agile development methodologies.
* API Testing: Knowledge of API testing using tools like Postman.
* JavaScript​: Familiarity with JavaScript for scripting and automation

Job Title: ServiceNow Developer  
  
Duration: 12 Months  
  
Location: PAN INDIA  
  
Timings: Full Time (As per company timings)  
  
Notice Period: within 15 days or immediate joiner  
  
Experience: 0- 2 years  
  
**About The Job****About The Opportunity**Operating in the enterprise IT service management sector, we empower large scale organizations to unify processes, data, and people on the ServiceNow cloud platform. Our projects span IT operations, customer service, and employee workflows, driving automation and resilience. Join a fully remote engineering hub in India focused on high availability, extensible architecture, and rapid feature releases.  
  
Role & Responsibilities  
  

* in-depth experience with the ServiceNow TPRM, GRC, IRM This would include –
* update sets knowledge/management,
* dashboard creation/management,
* policy creation/management,
* check definition/instance creation/management,
* MID Server installation/management,
* Agent Client collector installation/management,
* event/alert management rule creation/management
* overall ITOM troubleshooting capabilities.

**Skills & Qualifications**Must-Have  
  

* 2 years hands on ServiceNow development within ITSM modules.
* Strong JavaScript and Glide API scripting proficiency.
* Experience building integrations with REST and SOAP web services.
* Knowledge of ServiceNow update sets, ACLs, and security models.
* Exposure to agile delivery and version control with Git.

**Preferred**

* Certification as Certified Application Developer or CSA.
* Understanding of CI CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks.

Benefits & Culture Highlights  
  

* Fully remote work with flexible hours and modern collaboration tooling.
* Flat hierarchy encouraging innovation, mentorship, and rapid decision making.

Continuous learning budget for certifications and advanced ServiceNow courses.

IT Support representative
